83a5: u0f89u0fa4nga ci la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang sde ba dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mdzod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du zlab bya bar grar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig su kyi mtha' gci n
83a6: as bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzub/ dbyung bar brtsams so// khyim bdag mgon med zas byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
83a7: pa rnams sas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med tan med par 'dzub pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ra bru ci'i rgyu ma'i rkyen gyis 'jum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam
83a8: de bzhin/ gas pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas kyim bdag mgon med zas byin ngo mtsha

83b1: skyes pa'i mig dgrad des smras pa 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skung brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skad de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas rkyen cis
83b2: lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa de'i mdzugs thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna gzhi las byas par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so// de nas khyim bdag
83b3: mgon med zas sbyin gyi gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug
83b4: brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gdon pa der seng ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na shul so ji tsam du
83b5: byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag dper na 'khor las skur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo// 'khor los skur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o// de na
83b6: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug/ dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang
83b7: rnam ma tshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin du dri shig po'i pog por ngaganye bar bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi 'ang bdag byed du brlag/ rus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu 'brugo/
83b8: de ltar tshogs bsogs nas mi zhag la bsgo ba/ kye nad rje chur ston/ byed bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son pa dang / kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la/ gnod pa nyud ngam

84a1: nyam ba zung 'am/ 'tsho'am/ bstod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag
84a2: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / sun spyad 'i rkyen phran gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol cig jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
84a3: gyi ltar mnyan nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba de gengs te rims kyikyi rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/ / de nas lam gyis rub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
84a4: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba
84a5: nas/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye me khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas byin bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod tu gshegs su gsol
84a6: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tshe'i bar dra na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spun spyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan
84a7: 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gzung bas gdang / / de nas pa de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gan bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la logo pos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snganas song ngo // denas pa ma na/
84a8: 'ad du pa bang la/ ba log krol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs dkyin// 'khor dpags zin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khong namapar dul pa/ dgra com pa 'khor dag btsam pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba lakhang 'ad rags dang bram ba/ mdza

84b1: pa'akhor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa yang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge sache ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor blta/
84b2: nam mkha' snying bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgya skar gyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srang
84b3: dri za'i tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ zag zangasar se lha sa
84b4: yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yob med pa lta m+b+hi da ces pa/ sa po che dam pa 'dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po
84b5: rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum ban rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od gzer stong pas
84b6: lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo gro bstar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang khyim bdag mgon med
84b7: zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhes 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyeng du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas
84b8: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs gams pas sanan pa de'i chos rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab ca sre ga

85a1: gang phyogs mthon nab rgyags dmar/ nub rdzogs mthon shang phyogs dma' lce phyogs mthon byangar phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon ma phyogs dpa'/ mtha' tha~Md dbras dpang / dbus mthon mtha' dam ba /
85a2: gyur cing / 'jig rten 'dithams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad ma dang / ku
85a3: mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ga ru phya ma dang / rgya thos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi rtse ma dang / gur bum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la' lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ban pas 'thong zhing lha 'gos rnams kyang 'thor ro// bcom
85a4: ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag blang bar gyur to// gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to// mthon po rnams na ma'am par gyur
85a5: to/ / glang po che yang skad 'byon to// rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to// khyim na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang dang sgra 'byin to// long pa rnams kyis ni mig thob po// 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos
85a6: so/ / lkug pa rnams kyis ni spra nus par gyur to// dbang po mtshang ba rnams kyis ni dbang po rnams yongs su tshang ba thob bo// chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnams na du gzhi par gyur to// pan rA /
85a7: zung ba rnams na byang par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar bcas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las thar te// nor med pa rnams na nor rnyed par gyur to// de dag dang gnan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer
85a8: gshegs pa na ngo 'tshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so// gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas khyim

85b1: bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' shes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bye ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun spang bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gis
85b2: las nyes pa dang bcas pa chung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa chung zad kyang byas pa med do// 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang
85b3: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsangs
85b4: dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal/ brjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang sim rung snyam pa dang / bcom
85b5: ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos par mdzad do/ / gnon rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das
85b6: sa de bdag gi par chog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur te dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed tu bcug go/ de bzhin du gnas btan spa
85b7: byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/ / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing
85b8: gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan gau ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid

86a1: rnal zis 'tshe'o zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang ldad cig padod du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'thung ba gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas
86a2: gapa/ tshigs gags chaganas gos la 'dul pags pa rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das pa 'di na sa gso// cig ta pa bdag gis shes go/ sa cad da pa yang dgapa rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdon pa
86a3: sangs rgyas par bdag nyid gas kyis 'che nam thas lags na/ gau tam gang dag de skad ces srang ston pa de dag cig dge sbyong gtam la srung ba 'dabs pa ma lags sapa/ thal bar sgrub pa lags sa pa/ shas lda go mas
86a4: gsangs pa bzhin su ba lags sam/ chos sla ba lags sam/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sas/ cig de dag ga drang du par la pa chos dang 'thun pa'i chod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa mchis na spod pa'i chos kyi gnas sum 'byung
86a5: lags pa/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du sla ba de dag de gad du lung rgan pa bden pa de de la sbyar ba 'debs pa ma yin/ thal bar sgrub pa yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ chos smra ba med/ chos pa
86a6: 'thun pa'i chos yang rton pa yin te/ de dag gi dang du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i cod pa'i rjes su chod pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhin/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngo/
86a7: par sangs rgyas so// shes ldan gau ta ma de skad gsungs mod kyis shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag yod mi ches lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kye gau ta ma re shig rga zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di la ste 'od srungs
86a8: rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal bcan dang / me bam skra'i ba lad can dang / kA t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung blan med pa yang dag par rdzog

86b1: pa'i byang nab 'o par rdzogs par sadas rgyas par bdag nyid ga par bye 'i la lags na/ shes ldan go tam 'thung pa nas ring po ma lags pa gsang nga rab tu byung bas ga smos kyang ci 'tshal rgyal po chen po gnong ban po dag 'a kyang pa sa
86b2: sa bya gzhon dul b.lams pa napar babyas/ pazhagang shen/ rgyal bcad brgyas gas gan dul byang drugasang bar sa bya ga nan du ma zis gyis mnan par mi bya'o// rdul ba can po skul gsho nas kyang du gsad par ma bya/ gzhod dus kyis kyi
86b3: mngan par ma bya'o/ / rgyal ba rjed pa ma rung ngu khyad du gsang bar mi bya/ chung rul zil gyis mdan par po bya'o// rgyal pa chen po dag slong gnod du la thang du gsang bar mi bya gzho la zil byas mnan par mi bya'o// de ba'i phyir 'a/ dge slong gshon du
86b4: klung tha dang rngu 'phrul che shing bzu che ba 'dagra bcas par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka' stsal nas na bde gshegs kyis/ de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di gad gsungs/ rtsal rigs dpe byang ldan pa rtse
86b5: rigs bdu grags par ldan pa la/ bro dang ldan pas de bzhon zhes// byad du mi gsang zil ma man// rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis// rgyal sred dag ni thob gyur nas// chad pas bzod pa'i gnas da yod// rabs del shad tra nga/
86b6: dgas rang gi srog bsrung zhi // nga ga dan las bas na// ngani kyang dumi gsang cing // de la lags par bgakyang bya// gas grong ngam dgod paparang bya// gang sul ni ma cing zung na// blo dang ldan pa pa de bzhon napa// khyad du migasang gi mas na/
86b7: gang bA di thubad// dgas rnam pa tshogs la// gags rnyed das ni gnon nas kyang // skyes pa du me dum zin// de skyes dngad gi sags shing // dang ga dan la ltabs na// don kyad du migs ci // de la legs par bag byung // pa
86b8: tsod 'ab byed pa/ / las gnag bsreg bya ba pa'i me// blo dang ldan pas de rung shes// kyad du migasad zil mi mnan// me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang // rkyen las chen por 'byur ba yin// mas ring por po thogs par// grong rdal dang di bong byer sra/

87a1: de ltas rang gi srog bslang zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsang cing // de la legs par zag kyang bya// lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me// nags tshal sreg pa gang yin de// zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu// mdab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur
87a2: dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la/ / brten nas gang zhig cig mur pa// de la bu tsha yod min pas// bgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur// ta la'i go ni bcad pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs rabs kyang chad// de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing // rang gi don la
87a3: pas ni/ de ni kyad dmi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang // de bzhin brang 'gro ma dang ni// dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la// blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya// de bas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la stabs
87a4: ni/ de la khyad dumi gsad cing / de la legs par bag kyang bya/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dag ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom
87a5: ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhags so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po khras gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes
87a6: pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras kyis bad ci thob nas bdud rtsis 'gro batshim par byed do zhes sprid pa rgyal po zas gtsang gyis zos nas po nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo // gnyis pa gtang ba dang de yang shed du rab tu bla d+he/ po
87a7: gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang ma lag pal 'gram pa gtang nas po nya gang dang gang gtang ba de dang de dag pa nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'a
87a8: kha nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam mo/ / sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha'i ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal gtang nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub

87b1: pa ka bzod par be kho bas sred le gsel ba'i pi btang ba las de dag kho po'i gnang songs nas gan don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'des bcugs so zhes smra'o/ / ngani lo bos phrin yig rgyal ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang mi 'ong na ji ltar/
87b2: sems khongs su chud par me 'gyur// 'chang kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchi ste/ bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang ser ba de dang de nga'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid 'dug pa
87b3: 'od kyang song da de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ / 'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchi lags so// de nas rgyal ngo za ga tsang dang nyid kyis sbed yigazis pa/ lhums su zhags pa bzung nas su/ khyod ni bdag gis cher
87b4: ba bran te/ nyen mongs med pa 'bar kha bzhin du// rgyal ba sngon shing la bsdad na// nga ni khyod kyi slob ma yi// bal gsug ma 'phel 'gyur bas// gnan ni bde bas dga' bar mar// bdag ni ga snga gal bar ldan// gzhan pa dgang gis khyod ni ljon
87b5: shing lhag phran ma tshungs tsam na/ / bdag gi 'u ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bkun ba stan te// bu gcig yul mis 'bras bus yongs su spyad thob na// de la yon tan 'bras bu me ba ster khyod la snying rje med// gang tshe thog ma bstam pan// nyid don bsgrubs
87b6: nas gnyen rnams ni/ / shin// tshe dang phan gdags zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni// khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na// bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtses rjes su zung mdzod de// gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du
87b7: gsol/ / zhes sbed pa'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang // lam gyis dub pa la sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas tsang gis gsol ba'i yig lags so//
87b8: zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge rul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhengs nas thags so// chags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang 'char kas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser rgya'i gzhing pi ba'ad pa/ bcom

88a1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chang ka 'dor do// char ka sngon pa bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang / bdag gis mthus bkri bar brtsa
88a2: lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la chags su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing// sreg 'gags shi ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' bde// gzhi med nan
88a3: gang gi gzhi yi bkri/ / gshig yab kye rgya mor ma chags shing // sred 'gags bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'o// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mang 'di// gzhi med na ni gang gi bzhi yis bkri// gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med drang
88a4: cing / 'jig rten ma btsem cung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing // 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa// sangs
88a5: rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ / gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bgyi'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char
88a6: kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkan
88a7: stsalag/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang / yu ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / tha ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lnga bu rnams kyi
88a8: chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go/ 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka

88b1: 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas
88b2: par smras nas/ 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chang bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba las sogs pa dag go/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la
88b3: mgo bos pag pas te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchil
88b4: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod mod kho nas rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgon sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du skyon cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas ga
88b5: te shAHmi dge so ga/ na yang yod dam/ shes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am zhes 'dren/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis
88b6: rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o/ / gal te gzhon don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes blang na mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal ta gang du gnas par byed ces 'drin dgod
88b7: pa'am gtsug lag yang dro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'drin/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na byon no
88b8: zhes brjod par bya'o/ / ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ song shig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis/

89a1: gnas sams pas 'thaba' brar zhing / de bzhin pasam gtan pa rnams kyis// sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chang ka de ji ltar nang cig de nyid la grong khyer ser spyi'i gzhing son pa de ltar byin
89a2: kyis brlabs pa pa ngang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzod pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis hA
89a3: pa/ ci shAkya' dag/ na dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas
89a4: smras pa/ 2 ga 'akung ngam/ des smras pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos
89a5: 'dul ba legs pa spangs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung yod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo / / rgyal pos yang lag thams cad kyis 'khrud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug du bcug ste/ de'i don dur bcags rtsal ba dang 'a
89a6: ba brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bzhug go/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'chang ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la brtags nas nga 'tshar skyes te smras pa/ 'char
89a7: ka ci gzhon nador thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra ba nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/ nyim
89a8: dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/ / nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang dag gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am/ lha 'di 'angadra zhing cha byang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas

89b1: brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chung ma nga btab nas dbugs slar krung ste smras pa/ 'chang ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam// 'char kas smras pa byon no// dus ji srid na dbang bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams
89b2: la bsgo ba shes ldan dag gzhon na don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyes rgyal po'i pho brang byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par rA dzad ngo do// rgyal pos smras pa gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas
89b3: smras pa/ dgon pa 'am gtsug laka khang du'o// rgyal po za ga tsang gis smras pa/ 'chang ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la
89b4: sbas pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu ru gshig/ lnga bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan
89b5: nas na gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo
89b6: gal gya bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'jol na khyed bcag las su zhig lta bar rdzo bde chos gos dag long shig ces rko shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mod
89b7: kal bye ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser rgya'i gzhing gshegs te yabasas gdan ngom na byed cag las sul bar slob de chos gos ngag long shaganas pa/
89b8: dral to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'bor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhib/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs byin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral/

90a1: pa 'khor 'dod chags dang brab/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang ba'i rgyal/
90a2: po dad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta ba/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta ba/ dpa' bo ra ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
90a3: lam mkhan 'dren pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta ba/ khams kyi rgyal phran thon po'i tshogs kyis bskor blta ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba d+ha sad kyi
90a4: tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshags kyis bskor ba lta bu// 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor blta
90a5: bu/ rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thags bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi chags kyis bsor
90a6: bsta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa 'dregs pa dang bal ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma khrugs pa/ sa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
90a7: rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa// 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu da
90a8: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab tu ro hi kar byen to// rgyal po zas gtsang gis don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu

90b1: ra ha kar byon na zhes thos so/ / bos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i ga'i rdo ba dang gyo mo dang gseg pa rnams bsal nas tsan ran gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu zhim po'i ngog bor nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun phyang ma/
90b2: pos sbyangs te/ gang yang 'bab gong ciganas gang ma na rba bya'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gad rnam par bkrab dag shom bcug go// de na 'bab chur tigs dge slong kha cag ni
90b3: lag pa 'brab kya / 6des shing 'dor bar byed // kha cig de khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya'i rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba
90b4: bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kye zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo//
90b5: 'dul ba da // / bam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad
90b6: thab pas dka' thub kyi dgas sa gshegs nas lkog po zhig grub pa la ni ga ste/ de lta brgya stong phrag dums zhapa 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te dus dasring du bka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas dazhabs
90b7: kyis gshegs pa larnas pa dang bskad par gyur snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ltar thugs ma nagan shang phyogs kyi snying gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas skyong sa ma rnama~M pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/
90b8: 'chagapa dang gnags pa da man mdza/ yi'i nge 'dzinam par snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad do// me ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po dang dmar

91a1: po dang dgang po dang leb sha dang shel gyi 'do/ 'phrul drung du yang ston par mdzad de/ klu'i srang nas 'bar bar mdzad de su'i stong nas chu brang mo'i ldan 'babs par mdzad do// dra'i sang nas 'bar bar mdzad pa/ 'i
91a2: spang nas chu brang mo'i spun 'bebs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / shar phyogs la rdolta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdza 'phral gyipo 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul
91a3: mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/ / dge slong rnams ni tal drug gi srid tsam no'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsa pana'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong nam
91a4: bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi sred tsam da'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi sred tsam dge slong
91a5: rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi sbrid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// tsebaldan dadas lnga'i srid tsam ni ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid
91a6: tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnam
91a7: gang lhag tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phral de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to//
91a8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yi ni/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'o//

91b1: mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/ 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyas stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med gsal/
91b2: ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad pas gsel ba// bro zas yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// kun sman
91b3: zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ / bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'jug pa ma mnan
91b4: de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// shes lda na dag da gdong kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i
91b5: zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa nas chen po g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag
91b6: sdug tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba /
91b7: sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i/
91b8: zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gri tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa

92a1: rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs par shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar byob
92a2: su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
92a3: yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas na 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyed la 'di dang ni// kun spyan zhags la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos
92a4: pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gribs su las ma 'das pa'o zhes smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya stong phrag du bzil gyi mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la ba dan bshams pa nyid la
92a5: bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po zas tsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig ma rims gang pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu zhus pa// gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa
92a6: las/ / dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnams su// ji ltar bur ni 'ga' zhig bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i bdag po gang du ni// khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus
92a7: thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ / rgyal pos gsol pa// ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba bting ba yi// khri la mnal par mdzad pa las// gdi pa la ni ji ltar mnal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol
92a8: gnas mal ni/ / dga' ba byang chub yan lag ni// me tog bkram par chags med cing // yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal// rgyal po zas tsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni// gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ rnyog pa can

92b1: la dro ba yi/ chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gau ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med// bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas// yus mi gsher bar pha rol
92b2: rab tu rgal/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi// tsan dan gyis ni sra bkrus shing // ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las// de dang bral na mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshul khrims
92b3: nga yi rgyan yin te/ / tshul khrims nyid na byug pa yin// gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/ rmongs skyed nga la ci zhig bya// rgyal pos gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa// tsher dmar bcas pa'i sa bzhi la// zhabs kyis ji
92b4: ltar gshegs par mdzad/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga'i shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang// yang dag rtsol ba'i gzhon pa yis// sa kun rnam par rgyun yang // nyon mongs tshe rams gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo sngon
92b5: ne ka shi ka'i/ na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las// ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po/ nga'i go sa ni ngo tsha shes// nga yi bgo pa snam sbyar te// de bgos thub pa zhi ba
92b6: rnams/ nags khrod na ni mongs par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhod pa las// du ma'i ro ldan 'bras can gsol pa las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni// phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi//
92b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zas kyi sred pa thams cad sbyangs nas ni// nges par klung dang mnyam par bshad lda pa'i// ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi// 'jog rten kun la brtse phyir bstod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// mgur du
92b8: bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ / dkun skye bas kha ra'i chab gsol na// rnyog pa can la dro ba yi// cha ba ni ji lta zhig tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi yi bdag po gang 'brungs na// bdag la bdung ba thams cad ni// dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa//

93a1: chos kyi ro mchog bzung ngo // rgyal po zas tsang gis gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang // khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus gzhan bzhugs// nga lha gcig pu nags khong ba zhugs pa/ glo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs
93a2: pa med par bzhugs/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin de// dri ma bag chags bcas pa rangs spangs pas// nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te// de la 'di na bzigs pa cung zad med/ rgyal
93a3: po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ / khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar// 'khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na// gcig po khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par// thub dbang da ltar su yi mthus mdzad 'gyur/ bcom ldan
93a4: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / gau ta ma chos kyi mtsho ban dri med pa// tshul khrims 'jug dogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gso
93a5: pa/ gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsong // gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye// yid 'thung ba yang gan las skye// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang gi nga'i khyad gsod dang // gang zhig las ni
93a6: 'jigs pa dang / gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum yod min na// nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas tsang
93a7: gis gsol pa/ / shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba// legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs// khyed ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bur yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor
93a8: pa byas nas ni/ / thub pa'i zhab sa la mgo bos phyag byas te// bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa

93b1: legs par rnyed do sam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' bar 'khor nga'i bsam ba dang / bag la nyal dang // khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa
93b2: shAkya bdun khri badran stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas ba rgyal po sa tsang ni ma gtogs so/ / lha sbyin nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can/ sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang
93b3: bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i skams dbang du byed pa shes na bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cang dbang du bya ba zhig/ de la shAkya rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul
93b4: che ba mtha che ba yin gyis de skad ma sma shig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par the bo zas la
93b5: sogs pa shAkya drug khri drag stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ / ro hi ta ga'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs
93b6: par bdud rtsi byas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho bzhin du/ 9ra ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gi ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig/
93b7: gi ni nga sangs rgyas kyang chub du mas babyed do// cigags ni than med par dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// cig gis ni rgyun du rugs pa'i bras bu na sum du byas// bcig gis ni na ga phyi nga ba'ir bras bu// cig ci ni bathung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
93b8: spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ / bcig gis na sadas rgyas la skyabs su sod/ kha tsag gis na tshas la// btso gri ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag kyi dpal ched kyang sangs rgyas la gzhil/ chos la 'bag dge 'dun la ba' par bkod/

94a1: de nas rgyal po zas gtsad 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam ma
94a2: denas shAkya gzhon du zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po sgra mchog dam chos kyi// char bas 'gro ba 'don tshim mdzad do// mi zad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyang bar mdzod// rgyal po zas
94a3: gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no/ / snyam ste lhag par dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong
94a4: snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste lhag par dga' bar gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spod du gzhug go/ / rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum
94a5: pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin tu dga' ba yod kyis/ ma langs de'i zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka'
94a6: phul pa/ maud gal gyi brgyal ngo zas gtsang la so bas shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga ngan ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang/
94a7: gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon// maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs
94a8: so btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gang na bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag nar

94b1: gisten las mi spang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng ge bar snad la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang / 'grang ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do// me nge 'dzin la yangasams par 'ju/
94b2: par byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / seng po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
94b3: lebargyan dang shel gyi kha dog dag go/ / tshe 'phral zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi snod nas 'bang bar byed la/ lus kyi sad nas d+ha grar so'i sman 'bebs par byed do// lus kyi bang nas 'ab bang byed la lus kyi stong nas rba
94b4: grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu
94b5: 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
94b6: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang // zag zad dgra bcom gang
94b7: yin pa/ thub pa'i nyan thos par du mchis// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing ma mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa
94b8: de dang bral bar gyur to/ / bskabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de// kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na lha'i khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang

95a1: gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/ / brgya byin dang tshang
95a2: pa la sogs paltarnams kyis dA smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na/ brgya byin dang tshas
95a3: pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ce smos/ srog chags grog srung rnams kyis lha ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bkyed ba 'dod snyam pa las
95a4: de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la tshes 'chang par bzhed kyis na gro d+ha'i
95a5: kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi 'khad pa brtseg/ ma ga dan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig/ kau shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te na tho d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar re/
95a6: po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pazhig sprul to// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi pa sgo bzhin 'khod pa'i yul 'khor skyod dang 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar phyogs na ni yul
95a7: 'khor skyod dpung rgyan dang / rnam gdub 'khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po re sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o//
95a8: byang phyogs na ni lus dang po rgyan thams cad kyis can pa'o// de nas lharnams kyis dbang po bcu byin gyis n+ya gro rta'i kun dga' ba che thang du brgyan du bcug te/ bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song ste min nas bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par so so//

95b1: de na pa bcom ldan 'das brgya byen dang tshangs pa la sogs lha bcu lhung phrag du mas yongs su bser nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs ste/ lha'i 'khor bal po che'i gung la rin po che sa tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khrel gzhugs so// de na pa
95b2: dang ldan pa mdagal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gcang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der sang ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa mid gal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen
95b3: po nang du mtho bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ / ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dkab la chos 'chad de/ der mer gyur pa 'dug du mi dbang ngo // rgyal po bas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ yul 'khor skyong gi
95b4: smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skye sgor song ba dang / rgyal ba chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis
95b5: byas pa/ bzhin bzangs byed su sheb/ 'phags byas pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes pa'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der ma gyur ba 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po
95b6: sa gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po ga ri bzeng gas mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sded cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs byong su zhig/ mig me bzang gis smras pa/ rgya
95b7: pa chen po bdag na re ga ming ci phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mer gyur pa 'jug pa mi bang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ba skor song ba dang / rgyal po chen pa rnam thos kyis bus mthong nas sngas
95b8: pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdong cig/ rgyal po zam gtsad gas smras pa/ bzhan bzangs khyod su zhig rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni nam thos kyi bu'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i khor dge ba la

96a1: chos 'chad de/ der mer gyur ba 'jug tu mi dbang // de nas rgyal po chen po zas gcang kyi mngo bcom ldan 'das lha'i khar dag pal chos 'char pa de bdag gis blta'o snyam par 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'am
96a2: pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te ma mthong na khrag dran mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod pas de la thabs shig pasha
96a3: par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / des na rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga'
96a4: dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas
96a5: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ / de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i
96a6: 'bras bu mngon gsum du byas te de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du rjod pa pa ched ga tsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la bas ma bgyis/ mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon bya 'das
96a7: pa rnams kyi ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang / rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rtsamatshan
96a8: bskams/ ngus pa'i ri bo dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go// yang gsol pa/ pa la lan du pan gdags pa// dam pa'i dus

96b1: ni bgyi gas khyod kyis bdag la mdzas kyin sem mni tsham par gnas par bgyis/ / khyad kyis pa gni nga 'grolas/ drang te mthangs thar pal// bsgrim mi 'tshal bar shag lags te// thong kyis ga' bam pa lags/
96b2: po rnams pa khyad kyis ni// bdag ni tshang ba rnyed ldan ltar// mtharas rnyed pas srid pa yi// langs spyad dag na rnyed par mdzad// de nas rgyal ba zas gtsang bstan las langs te thags phrag pa gcig tu gzang nas bcom ldan 'das gangan
96b3: ba re logs su thal ma sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum pa gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzang drugs pa//
96b4: ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gas bas zla ga'i nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mag bas rtsag zas ta bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ldan pa
96b5: chas te/ zas dkar gangan ba der song ste byin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu khyod rgyal srang thob kyis rgyal sring kher cig/ ca'i slad drangs bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so// gang gi gdugs la
96b6: lags/ de ring kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma lan gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chas bshad pa de'i nyam la shAkya bdun khwa bdun snang dang ldan gcig bden pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du ba bo zas la rgyal
96b7: sring khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri drug spong dang ldan cig bden pa mthong lags so// de bzhin
96b8: du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ra ha ta ka' ba skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so//

97a1: gal ting ltar mar nang sa zhig rgyal srid la gzhas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAba'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bze' das de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang thug sa dbang bathar ro// denas rgyal pa za
97a2: g is de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhir bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snong gzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyar 'dren gyis gdags tshor gsol tsun ma
97a3: 'das gdags tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs man pas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs sa bskor
97a4: 'dun gyis mngan dra bdar nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga bkangs gangan ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gang la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
97a5: slong ga dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi la gnas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du nar/ tsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bar ngag la gnas bstabs
97a6: shing tshim par byas te/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis la zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed 'gyu bar rig nas gser gyi byam bum blangs te// bcom ldan 'das lan gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan
97a7: pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad pa/ / sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'das// shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi// yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni// rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i
97a8: gzhi shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shed na gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// zhes gdags par byas so// bcom ldan

97b1: 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshor gsol/ / nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo// rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod la mazhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dkara' thub drag po'i
97b2: brtul thugs kyi byed par bdag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral ba can 'di dag spyod las ka zhing sems rang ba yin mod kyi/ las mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ce 'dra ba zhig
97b3: gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/ des bsams pa/ shAkya'i khor gyis yin na snyam nas/ de nas shAH'i thams cad bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhan du ngan thams cad thub pa rab tu mabyung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/
97b4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/ khyed bcag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ ra
97b5: blang shig/ ci thams cad ngam/ khyim re nas re re'o/ bka' bzhin 'tshal des rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer sar skya'i gzhir dril glegs su bcug pa// rgyal po'i zhal nas ra'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas re re rab tu thA
97b6: shig ces de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bro bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang / ming chen no maung chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no// ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi pa 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse ba
97b7: byad/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// ming chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril grogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams las khyi ma re nas re re rab tu thung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu bung shig/ ngas smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis
97b8: khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig/ bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran mtshos cig/ yum khyed gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags med

98a1: de dang de la chung zad kyangs srur dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po legs sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro// bude shin du byas te yid ches par bya'o// des gzeb stong pa rje'i yis bkang nas khangs dkar pos dkris te rtswa skyegs
98a2: la rgyas btab nas bu me mngag gzhag ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang ci yang ma mchis so zhes spros shig/ das ngal khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas
98a3: des bsams pa/ / rang sangs rgyas kun shes pa la bsod snyoms phal ba gang yin pa de derang ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya// de'i zan sbyang bar bya'o zhes des rje'ude rnams su sran char dang / tshor ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo // ji tsam na/
98a4: mdag gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / des smras pa/ bu mo 'o ni ne ci yod/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams pa na 'di stong par ci ste bskur/ gdon mi zaH/
98a5: 'di ni cir yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o zhes ci tsam na kha phye ba dang / bskyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so// de ma la
98a6: gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phung bskur nas spring ba/ yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu shes dag bskur ba'i rigs so// des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming chen la bstan nas/ bu
98a7: mthong ngang/ / sum mazeng lags so// khyod kyi mos sngar bsod rnams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can sa skal babacang pa dang ldan pa la kyad 'gran ma tshal cig ces ma smras sas/ des smras pa/ yum bsod nams kyi dbang bang po dang lda
98a8: ma rung ma ldan yang rung bdag ni rab tu mi 'thung ngo zhes di ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bar khas len du ma 'ab bo/ / de nas de ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril spogs su brlag pa shAkya rnams pas med//

98b1: tu byung shig ces bskon khyod ce rab tu 'byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug/ des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu blang
98b2: bas legs par bsgrubs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro// khyim par 'dug te legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi thob bo// ma bskyangs na sems cand / la ba dang / dung 'gro
98b3: dang / yi dgas thob po// yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo // des smras pa/ bu lags kyis de bzhin
98b4: du gyis shig/ ma 'gags pa'i ne'u bla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo // de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan bi bar len te/ de bi bang len pa na rgud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to// ma 'gags pa pi bang len pa la byang ba yin
98b5: bas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de skor ba sdad de sgo srungs kyi maM la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/ sgo srungs sod nas
98b6: shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/ lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chabasgo na sdod cing mchis so// des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa dang /
98b7: rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/ khyod 'ongs na ji srid pon/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe pi bang len pa na blang zad nas snga gzhan du thar ba na'o// de mchog tu la mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/ byed pa 'ang len pa la byang ba yin/
98b8: shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis sbas pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim de nas re re rab tu zung shig par bsgo bas de khyed kyi mkhyen par mdzod/

99a1: she sa ca // las rnam pa/ gas te can ma tho yang rab tu byung ste/ zas ba med byas kya pa di nyid dru gnas tha shig/ rang nyid tu gnas gapa go// mal thab pas mas bgan can gyi gos ga ma rtogags
99a2: ma sa 'i sa sa gags ta nga/ dal/ rna sa togs ca pa med pa'i ga pa byabs so nas smras pa/ ci 'a na med dang/ de rnams kyis bta ya ma gas ma dang
99a3: nga 'chang byas so/ / sang gags pa mtshan mom pade bzhin nas nas na parnangs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ma gags pa cig pa ba bar gcad logags/ des smras pa// ba bar ga ma 'dag/ rgyal par smral/ co phyir/ ma gags
99a4: pas smras pa rims pag pa rdo can gyi/ sa tid par me tog gi si lam babs pa ma rtag gi u0f7fbas su gang lags so// rgyal ba semasas pa brtagags kyad kyis rims pag gi dri can rtsigs patid ha NiH/ mam pas smras pa
99a5: la kA bas gtang ba lags so/ / rgyal pos dkor ba bgagadas klas pa/ khyod gyis rims pag sa dri can grags pa ga to u0f7f/ ram rmas pa/ lha ba dag la thug pas gta pa lags pa// rgyal bas thag pa pa gnas smras pa/
99a6: byar rinas pagag rje cad kyis gas dang la/ thag pas klas pa/ rnam bu thag 'i gro nga nig lus pan bdag rams kyis thebs bshin dkyis pa lags pa// la bas smras pa/ gzhanan kyang kyis gyu gas/ ris rnas pa
99a7: banyams su myong bas rims ngag gi ri lags so/ / rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan gyis te smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAH skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa yin no// de nas brgya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhanags ta 'bo ba
99a8: tu byung na sa rkyen pa rgya rnams kyi rgyal bar kru te/ de shAcwa rnams la gan par byed par 'gyur gyis// mal bdag cag thams cad 'dus la byed slob bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkrag sa/ de rnas thams cad lus nas

99b1: smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'thung na khyod ci byed/ lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs cig bsham par bya ste bsu'o gzhan yang
99b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phral bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i skams skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa/ sa
99b3: rab tu 'thung na bdag ci ste 'dug/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni brdzun du sla ba yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam po// de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs pa la bris nas grong khyer mer skya'i
99b4: gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/ bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ thos par gyis la rab tu dga'
99b5: ba bskyed cig ces bsgre'o/ / lha byin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung ba shes par gyur dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig ma/ nga ni gal te rab
99b6: rgya mazung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam/ cis rab tu zung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid pa'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'i ngaskang du sems te/ shA
99b7: rnams kyi thasa'i khyed pa la blta'o snyas nas das grong byar gsagam dang mo bas la/ tsan dan gyis chus chag cag ga pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bcwa dang mar 'byung ba po blang sa/ ga pa'i 'gaso pa shag me tog
99b8: snga tshogs kyi si lams dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go/ de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgon seng ge'i dril 'dug go/ shAkya mo dang shAkya gzhon pa ro mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang mar nga kho la ma can dang / skar 'dadang

100a1: stagaya pa dag la 'dug go/ / shAkya rnams kyi 'byod pa la blta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che 'am/ tshong 'dus dang bzhi mdo dang / sa pa po po rngams su 'dug go// shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes pa
100a2: bur/ su ga gis ni thugs zung bar 'gyur ba btag pa'i phyir bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan dang / lhas mkhan dag bkug go// shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pa dang ma dag la bltas ras
100a3: so song shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ re shig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa
100a4: la sogs pa phyir byung ba na de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/ / de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i btags
100a5: dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / ko ka li ka dang / khan da dra ba bya dang / ka Ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir bung ba dang pod bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyang mtshan pa'an rnams
100a6: kyis bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// nye dga' glang po che la zhon nu phan tshun du lta bar byed pa da mu tig gi do shal ltung ba dang / glang po che las babs te grangs
100a7: so/ / de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gu dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa shwaHlnga brgya po der bas bsred
100a8: mos chal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong chu shog ces bya bas rab tu snang na kha cig gis ni nyes par byed pa

100b1: 'gyur kha cig gis de nyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/ dge slong tshar shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pas ma langs thams cad dge slong rnams kyi
100b2: gsol ba dang bzho'i las kyis rab tu blang ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser s+ya'i gno shAHrnams gsol pa dang gzhi las kyis rab tu 'byung ba pa dang
100b3: bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa
100b4: rasra 'dreg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi sgra 'breg pa na de dom bur gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag la skad 'dzer cing dbugs ba rdzags por skra 'dreg par byed do/ / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du
100b5: de snying rje je skad du bcom ldan 'dal chung ngu dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa mi phal ba rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig/ khyed kyis
100b6: spangs te gson pas ni 'gum mi bsngo'o/ / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis rdo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/ cho ga gis mya ngan ma byed cig/ ngas ji ltar mi phal ba rnams la bsnyen bkur
100b7: byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas shAkya gnon du rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon dag nyon cig/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag bcag la bskur gyi byas la bdag
100b8: cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyang rgyan rnams de'i tshe 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog shig/ de rnams kyis se mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa'i na po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i

101a1: rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spangs so/ / nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong pa dang / des bsams pa/ re shig gzhon 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang /
101a2: lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyan pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag
101a3: kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs
101a4: r gyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'bregs pan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba
101a5: skyes par mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so// nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas semra
101a6: khongs su chud cing 'dug ste rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA re'i bu gang gi phyir da skar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dadabang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu
101a7: 'byung na/ / bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan dum skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las
101a8: yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su rgud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs grub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la

101b1: ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ byung snying dpor byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung ba 'dil ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rigs dang ni
101b2: zur dang rus la rtog mi mdzad/ / 'das nas yun rings lon pa yi// las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad// gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshwar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
101b3: sngar 'dod dang / khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ des khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom ldan 'das gdan ba der dong nas
101b4: phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
101b5: dngos po 'tsha la lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar zad ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad bapyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis
101b6: bka' stsal ba'i mong kho na spu bye ba dang / sngam sngar gyon pa dang / lag par srur bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / pra dang kha wu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas pa
101b7: gyur te/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ sra byi snam byar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / mo la dbang po rab zher gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs par lus gzugs bkab par 'gyur/ shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rkan
101b8: rabs ji lta bu bzhin du 'dud par byed pas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/ nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so// de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa

102a1: gnyis la yang gdung bar bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu dargyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di nan gyis dargyal gyi rigs pa cog la thud cig/ des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa das can po la ba tu gsos/
102a2: par gyur te/ sa cher po'adi g.yos/ rab tu gsos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu lug ste/ shar phyogs mthon ni nub phyogs dma'/ nu phyogs mthon na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthor ni byang phyogs dma' khang pos/
102a3: mtho ri lta phyogs mang / dbus mthon na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma' bar byung te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so// lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bA rgyal spang bar byer
102a4: rab tu byung ba yan gyis zung cig/ des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la sa gdugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis shes de 'dun du ma btub ste/ der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag go// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/
102a5: tsam thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di na
102a6: chos nyid yin te/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bar na sa na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba
102a7: 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du cug go// de'i tshe ba ra na sI'i grong khyer na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i drung du bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya
102a8: bsod nas smras pa/ bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog/ des smras pa/ khyod la kar sha ba ni lnga brgya yod dam/ des smras pa/ med do// song la kar sha ba na lnga brgya khyer te shog shig/ de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags

102b1: pas dus dus su me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pasna tshogs skyel bar byed pa dang / de de la sdug pa skyes so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ba ra na sIr dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang gi khyim na
102b2: rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga'as mthong nas yi chad par gyur te/ smad 'tshod ma bzang mos bsams pa de ring ba ra na sI'i mi rnams gos dang phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis srubs nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhani cig
102b3: ga' mgur spyod par 'gyur na/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dka' su zhig dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur shes de de snyam du sems shing bram ze'i kye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des de mthong ba dang / sngon gyi byas pa drin du
102b4: gzo ba yid la bskyed nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u song la shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog dag khyer te shog shig/ bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o// de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshad kyis bsdus nas song ngo //
102b5: deng gzugs dang / lang tsho dang // ser ba'i yon tan brtags nas mos shing zhen pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pas namanangs pa dang mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur nas/ ji tsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas gang gi
102b6: tshe'ajig rten gyi dus sngon gyi ched du me tog thams cad btus zin pa de'i chas nas me dog gi ched du pan tshun song ba na ma med nas/ ngas shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba'i me tog cig khyer nas de'i drung du song ste tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ g.yang
102b7: gzhi thogs pa thu po mdzes dka' ni/ / ma sha phyed med chung gzhan skom las kyis// de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas ngus na// sbyin pa'i me tog shing Sha 'di yin no// des spras pa/ so ngal me tog gzhan dag khyer la shog shig// 'dod pa
102b8: rnams la so sor brten par byed pa ni kun tu sbyor ba la sogs te/ de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas so ka'i zla ba'i tha mi'i nyin par sprin med cing // rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus na grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring pa'i yul

103a1: dkon pa dag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus dag dbyangs su len cing me tog bu'o/ / rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dgas 'tshor du chos pa na de nyi ma'i 'od zer rnon pos gdungs nas grib ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa dang / de'i chu'i sgra thos nas
103a2: tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ / steng na nyi ma gdung byed cing // 'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la// glu len khyod kyi lus la ni// ci phyir nyi ma'i gdung ba med// mdzes dag/ sa kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te/
103a3: tog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags// bya ba bya ba ma yin pas// 'jig rten 'di gdungs nyi ma min// rgyal pos bsams pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam
103a4: la mkhas pa zhig yin te/ des na nyi ma phyed kyi tshe 'dug nas me tog thu'o snyam nas/ des btug ste smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shig bsil bar byed pa'i gtapa dag byos shig mnyan to// des bsams pa/ rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa
103a5: yin te/ des na 'di skad smra'o snyam nas/ des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas rgyal po lus gdung pa dang bral bar gyur to// rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag
103a6: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan ci gdags/ lha rgyal srid phyed kyis so// de nas rgyal po des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang / sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin//
103a7: rgyal po'i pho brang du ma la bzang po sbyin nas de de la nyal ba na bzang mo rjes sa dran par sems shing rgyal srid byed po de yang slad 'tshor bzang mo'i phyir blad do snyam mo// yang bsams pa/ rgyal srid byed po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba
103a8: zhig/ mal bdag gis de srog dang 'bral bar bya'o snyam mo// yang bsams pa/ rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya snyam nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// don ma grub na 'dod 'gyur lo// don grub 'dod pa ldog

103b1: mi 'gyur/ mgruban ni pongs srung pas// de bas don ni don ma yin// ji tsam nas nangs su nye ban de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g.yang gnyis la bting ba nas nyal lo// namanangs par rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag za so'i
103b2: khye'u de lug shig/ de la rgyal srid byed sbyin no// rgyal po'i po nya dag 'ongs pa na mal chen po nas babs te g.yar gnyi sa la bting nas nyal ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang mdad pa bskyed de rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lba 'di ni N+ya
103b3: srid kyi 'os ma lags so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha nyon mongs mal chen po gya non pa spangs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas mchis nyal ba'i dngan pa la mos pa gang lags pa de rgyal srid stsal te ci rung /
103b4: rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag shes rab can de de la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur gyis lug shig/ de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ kye'i bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po nas babs te g.yang gnyi sa la bting
103b5: nas nyal/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas nas de nas smras pa/ lha gnad par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te gal te khyod rab tu byung na khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs chur zad rtogs/
