182a4: srid pa gsum/ / btang nas byang chub matog reg shog/ de rus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog kun dadang / bun da ri ka dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gyur pa/ rkang lag legs par
182a5: gnas pa/ glang po ches srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba// skal ba mchog gi mtshan can/ bsod nams byas pas mthong ba la zhon nas shin du sdug pa'i bran dang / mdza' bshes dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgya skad gyi tshigs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin
182a6: du so ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing / dad pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri gegs dang / khu b+hag dang / shang shar te'u sba 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal gyisar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas grang pa'i bram ze kha cig
182a7: gzhon du thams cad sgrol gyi drang du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon na pyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ yang smras pa/ lha ma ni ltar bcas 'jig rten du// byed ni thams cad gtong zhes grags// khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di
182a8: ni/ bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' grang po che'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po che'i mchog de byin nas

182b1: smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la// mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang / de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog
182b2: rgyal sring 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas spang ba'i bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin du khros 'khrugs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul nam
182b3: 'dug par song shig/ de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol pas spangs pa dang bsams pa/ bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po che de yang btang
182b4: ste/ de bas khyim na gnas pas ni// ci nus pas ni sbyin pa gtad// dka' thub nags su brten nas ni// nges pa mchog dag bya ba yin// bslangs na mi sbyin bya ba yi/ tshig ni smra bar mi bod kyi// de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te// dka' thub nags
182b5: su rab tu 'gro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags byin ma'i drung du song ste/ de dag rgyas par smras so// de nas rgyags byin ma thos pa thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gas
182b6: thal mo sbar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te de ltar na bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags su mchi ste/ bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lags so// ci'i slad du zhe na/
182b7: dam mkha' zla bas songs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar sa ni lo tig gis stongs dang // pad ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa dang // bud med khyim thab kyis stong de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag cag mthar gdo mi
182b8: zabar 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin no// khyod ni bza' ba dang / bzang ba dang / mal cha dang / bgob mchog la goms pas shin du skyed de ba yin/ dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtswa dang lom bting bang ninyal/ tsA ba dang me tog dang

183a1: bram thun pa/ dngung ba dang / zug dzad dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa lani D+ha/ yang dang yang du zacag pa la na bsten/ bdag nyad kyi ba thams cad lani bstan dgos/ blo brang du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni
183a2: 'bang dgos la/ den yang dgadon ma za bar ci rus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste de la khyod kyis chud zed kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so// debs na re shagang dang yang legs par sems shig rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rdzob sras bdag rdo ci thos
183a3: sras kyi rjes su bsgrubs lags so/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gas te de lta na dam bcas pa de dag khyod kyis dran par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba'i drung du song das mgo bos phyag byas te/ yab gas/
183a4: bdag gis sbyin par gling chen kyal// nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol// bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchi lags u0f7f// mos dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyung // de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngang byas
183a5: dbugs kyis brnangs te mang 'dar 'dang pos smras pa/ bu sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug shig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ra dang bcas par yang // gal te ldog par 'gyur gdang yis// sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las
183a6: sems ni ldog par mi bgyid / / zhes smras nas song ngo // de nas bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas po brang 'khor gyi maM dang yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang
183a7: bzhin du song ngo / / de nas mi zhig gis dri zhing smre sngags 'dor po'i sgra/ de yang thos/ skye bo'i tshogs chen por grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di tsho nges 'debs pa
183a8: las gyur des smras pa/ shes ldan cim shes sam/ 'di ltar mi'i dbang po nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang / brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di nas spyugs/ de ni bu dang chu mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa la/

183b1: po zad 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin du snying rjes tshe des 'debs/ de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor ba rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag slar deng shing // ra de shig 'di ltar// /
183b2: shin du yun ring po nam sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi zar bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/ gan gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za ba
183b3: sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / de ca' phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de// mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/ sems nas// khyed kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis// zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo ba tan pa
183b4: sa/ de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa na// byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul
183b5: nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/ khyod kyi shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ral ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes te tshig brlong pos bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o nags na'ang mi
183b6: dbang sras la slong ba dang / / bram ze 'don shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo// mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa// 'di la 'dir ni snying rje cig mi skye 'am// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis
183b7: bram zam gro shig/ ci'i phyir zher/ rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na// kun sbyin med par bgang zhigags sa steng byang chub 'thob// skyon sogs pa rol byin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchogs/
183b8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa/

184a1: shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir// bdag ni drang srong chen po mchog gis bskor ba yi// zag med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog/ de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze lagyi
184a2: nas bzhon nu mdog gnag phrag pa la byer/ thugs byin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dga' thub kyi nang logs sungs pa dang ris gyis bka' thub kyi nags su phyin to// de nas thams cad sbol dag 'brub kyi tshal deng rang gi snying mgub
184a3: byed pa'i brtul zhugs grangs te gnas so/ / ci tsam na rgyags byin pa rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyinags su song ba dang bram ze zhig thams cad skol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rkyal bar gyur cig/
184a4: padag ca bkol ba ma mchis pa// sra shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na// de ni don du bus pa gnyis// khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtod pa la chung shig/
184a5: sems shing 'dug pa dang / de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod
184a6: kyang ni kun sdeng snying rje yi/ / bdag nyid can du sa steng grags// ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du// khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs// de skad ces ci smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po
184a7: rang gi srog de gtod pa la 'ang/ / lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na// rang gi bu ni gtong ba la// bdag blo gzhan du 'gyur ci smos// bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi// bdag gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i// bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na//
184a8: ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa// 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod// gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas// bus pa btang la bdag ming zhes// kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'od gis// bram ze bdag ni khrid ni legs// de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol

184b1: smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying rje brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po lta bu/ dge
184b2: sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo brang ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/ skye bo bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mgon med pa dang / ltogs pa yongs su sdug pa thams cad kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa nyid kyis bdag 'ongs
184b3: na nom pa med pa'am/ lam gyi dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/ mthong na don med pa 'am/ re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i
184b4: yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta bstabs na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ / de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtad ba'i rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing bza' mig mtshungs med pa
184b5: ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ / grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang // mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtod pod yod ma yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos
184b6: nas bu la chags pa'i smod pas 'di dag sems par byed de/ gal te re shig pu gnyis po// bram ze byin na bu dang ni// bral bas las byung sdug bsngal dag/ bdag dang rgyags byin gyis 'thob 'gyur// 'on te 'di la ma byin na// brtul
184b7: zhugs las kyang nyams blar cing / / bram ze 'di ni tshig chad de// ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro// nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i// mya ngan sa steng bdag gis blang // de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa// zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par
184b8: 'ag de nas byang chub sems dang thams cad sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par gtang bar chad nas smras pa/ kye khobs dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyis// rgyamatsho chen pos sar 'jig byed pa/ gting mi dathongs/

185a1: bar rab tu byin pa dag/ pha rol bsgral byar lam gyi zam stegs bca'/ zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can// ma zhum kha nas de skad tshen smras nas// mchi yi'i brlan tus mig ni gang gyur pas// byis pa gnyis po bram
185a2: des byin yang smras pa/ bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// 'jig rten rnams ni bskal bar bya// byis pa gnon nu dag kyi dam thag tus 'di rnam badrug tu gsos so//
185a3: de nas sa gnos pa des nags de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can nams spangs nas phan tshun smras pa/ sa ni mi zad g.yos gyur pa// 'di ni su yaM mthu ltas yin// gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba// shin tu gsal bar shes par bya// de na gnas
185a4: 'jog dang dusacig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/ gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags su 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du
185a5: 'od pa'i mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa/ yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir btang ste des na g.yos par gyur to// // 'dul ba bzhi bam po brgya pa// / de nas bus gzhon nu
185a6: de gnyis kyis zos snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ / yab cig yum ni ma mchis par// khyod ni bdag cag rtsol bzhed pa// re shig de ni mthong zu ranas// nganas
185a7: bdag cag stsal du gsol/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag nga'i snying du mi sdug min// snying brtse snying par
185a8: min te/ 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// yon tan mthong nas btang ba yi ni// ci nas payi byang chub mchog/ zhi ba rang gi thob nas ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i// rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgralo// de nas byis pa gzhon

185b1: de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo reg nas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang smra bab pa'i tshig gis ral gyis smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na// ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi
185b2: phrin/ khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces// yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol// yab gzhan yang byis par gyur pas zla ba byed la nongs pa bgyis pa gang // gal te la lar thugs la mi bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am// gus par mnyan pas
185b3: yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/ / de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags shes bzod pa mdzad du gsol// de skad ces smras nas phal phyag 'tshal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin tha ma la smra bar yid la gcags
185b4: pas yang dang yang du phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung de dag gis snying thong nas yid kyi byang chub tu sngon lam
185b5: btab ste/ dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i skyil bur zhugs so// byis pa gzhon nu dag ded ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// lha stong phrag du mas yang bar snang la ca co dang
185b6: gzha'i sgra'i byin cing / e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che// byis pa 'di gnyis gtang nas kyang // gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa// de ni nges pa smad cig go// de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su
185b7: chas pa lngas che thad du g.yos pa des myung ba kho nar bstig nas de nyid du song ba dang / lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thar par bya bar brtson pas byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar
185b8: byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas se ng+ge mo zhig gis gzugs su bsgyur te lam 'gaganas 'dug pa dang rgyags sbyin mas ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg skags// khe so'i 'di dag bkag

186a1: nas ce ste 'dug/ ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo ngas gyur na// lam las bzung ste myur du 'gro bar gyis/ gzhan yang khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chud ma la// bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi// btsun mo yin pas chos
186a2: kyi spun 'gyur gyis/ / ri dgas rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang lha seng ge mo'i gzugs su bsnang ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo // de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shes pa'i ltas dag
186a3: mthong nas lung tsam zhig bsams pa/ ji ltar bar snang la dung mo'i sgra grag pa dang / ji ltar lta tshal na gnas pa'i 'thung po rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grag pa las na gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig zung bar gyur to snyam
186a4: nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang // ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang // ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las// bus pa de gnyis btang bar des// ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa dang // ba dag gi snying ni 'angarab dang // ji ltar lus kyang da rnab ya// /
186a5: bus pa de yang gtang bar nges// zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bste gnas su zhugs te/ mi dga' bzhin bltas na bu de gnyis ma mthong nas de nas rmongs shing snyad 'ad bas bsti gnas/
186a6: kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di ni ni gzhon nu mdog nag sring mo dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phru gu dang lhan cig rtag tu rtse rtse/ 'di ni de gnyis kyis rdul las byas pa'i khyi ma yin/ 'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha byad yin na
186a7: de gnyis nam thang nag sngon dgags pam thong gas rgyas bur zhugs nasanyam me nga man ma de/ po/ gag namatha bar 'ad pasas pa dang bras tha rdzogs cegs bzhag na ma mag mtshams bzhin du
186a8: thabs zhabs la gtugs te smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo de gnyis gang du mchis/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/ re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur na// bus pa de gnyis de la byin// de la rjes su yi rang

186b1: gyis/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyags spyan ma ri dgas mo mdab drug can gyis log pa bzhin du sa la stsal nas nya chu'i gnas nas byung ba bzhin du 'gre ldog par byed/ khrung khung bu stor ba bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du dra/ babe'u shi ba
186b2: bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don cing smras pa/ pad mo gzho nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can// lag pa pad ma'i mda' ltar gzhon sha can/ bdag gi ba gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ga/ 'grib pa dag tu song nas sdug bsngal grub/ ri dgas bu ltar drang zhing ri dag su cha ga/ ri rigs lhan
186b3: theg pasti gnas dga' ba na/ / de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur// gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur// mig ni mchi mas gang pa'i mig gis ni// snying rjes du pas shin tu sdug bsngal ba// de ring bdag gis legs par/
186b4: ma thobs// skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho// de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed pa skyed pa// zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za// bzod dang gnas pas bla ma rtag dga' bas// bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo// de gnyis ma
186b5: dang nyed bral ba dang / / rtsa lag rnams kyis gzulu mas spangs pa las// skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas// bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo// skom zhing bsgres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na// de gnyis su yi dbang
186b6: gis 'gro bar 'gyur/ / zan du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni// de gnyis nyam thag/ sdug bsngab yongs su zin// bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag na// srog chags sdug pa brgya dag bral ba yi// sdig las shin tu
186b7: mi zad 'dir byas pa/ / des na babe'u med bzhin chodes 'debs// bden cig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang // sems can kun la yang ni mnyam blang ba// bden cig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/ na du gyur pa las nabyang pang pog ma byugs/
186b8: sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrung ba'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma theb be 'dug par mthong nas snying du sdug nas bakhyud de smras pa/ bum pa ril pa chung ngu'i chus banus pa/ pho ma rnams la chu thigs badzag pa yi/ ljon shod nams/

187a1: ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin// bus pa chu zhom zung lta bur dra// yang bus pa gzhodu de gnyis dang ce rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phru gu ba sti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dag te/ ting rje rje ska kyi tshog gas dpa bus sbas pa/
187a2: de'i ne'u bla mthong bar 'dod pa gang // gnas su ma tshugs mtshan thang tshol byed pa// ri dgas phru gu rtsu ba 'di dag kyang // ri dag sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no// de nas bus pa gzhon de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam dang rngas bcad pa dang / bus pa
187a3: gnon de gnyis rjes drang por ma byung gi gya grus gang bar mthong nas skrag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ ji ltar 'ben pa'i rjes zung dang // kha lar myur du song pa las// brdegs te khrid par gdon ma ba// rtsem tham ze ba te med mchog/
187a4: mgul ni dbugs kyis bsngags shing skad kyang 'dzer// mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu// ri dgas bzhinu mig kyang rig rig ste// rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas
187a5: mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis nam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis// btang ba ma yin sdang bas min// sems can kun la phan don du/ btang bar dka' ba'i bu re gtang // mchog tu gtang dga' bdag
187a6: nyid dang / / bu dang chung ma rnams gtad nas// sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rgyags byin bdag gis gtong ba la ten gtang dka' ba'i// bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i dor du gtang// bdag dang chung ma
187a7: gzhon ner yang btang bya te/ / kun la thams cad btang ba'i blo gros nga la yod// de nas rgyags byi na mas sems brten te/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis// khyod bro gzhan du ma 'gyur cig/ gal te bdag bsngal
187a8: bzhed na/ dogs pa ma mdzad bdag stsol cig/ gzhan yang dpa'o gang phyir nyid kyi mi// sdug pas chags pa gtad pa yi// don de myur du thob nas ni// srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems

187b1: dpa' dang / rgyags byin brtson 'grus shin tu mar du byung ba dang / shin tu bya dka' bar rig nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bkor te/ steng gi bar snang las bsti gnas der lhags na snang ba rgya chen pos gnas de gsal bar byas te/ nam
187b2: mtha sa jug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ltar 'ag rten mongs pa the na gzung gis bcings pa'i rna thos can// longs spyod la chags kyang gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang // khab bdag kyad cig
187b3: pa med pas dga' ba byed pa'i bu gtong bas/ / nges par go 'bar ba de dang zhi ba dri med da/ 'a ba med pas 'thob// de gad ces byang chub sems dpa' gro ba skyed nas lharnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di cig bu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs pa
187b4: 'gyur gyis/ mal bdag gis rgyags byin ma bsad ngo snyas nas/ de nas bram ze'i cha byang du bsgyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ yan lag kun bzang byis thab las// 'grob ma cing rnying nyeb/
187b5: rags na sngags pa'i srang mo 'di// bdag la bran mo'i don du rtsol// de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze la sbas pa// ngo tsha med bcing brkam pa khyod// 'di ni bram ze'i bshar te// khyod ka 'byon ma mi byed cing // dam tshas dga' bar
187b6: 'dod ngas/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis rgyags sbyin ma la btag par brtsams pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' pa smras pa/ bdag ni bdag la g.yar ngan meng / de bzhin
187b7: ba gal lda ma lags/ gcig bu ri lar bzugs 'gyur zhes// de ltar khyod bla dag pa dngan bcid// de nas byang chub sems dpa sa rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa// go' phang mi zad mya ngan med pa tsho bdag la/ sa steng 'ding ni rtags kyi
187b8: mya ngan bya mi dgos/ / khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs// bdag ni ri dgas mchi ba bzhin du bsti gnas ben// de skad ces smras nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa// sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir / bdan

188a1: gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/ / rgyags sbyin 'dir yang yongs btang nas// yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur// snyam du rig nas rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste bram ze de la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis brang sdug pa 'di// snying nas snying nye bsre ba nyan// ya rabs
188a2: tshul can snyan par sgra/ / bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhes su gsol// de nas mche ba bzang po yi// chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir gtang // tshul gru ni ji lta bar// sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos// de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te khyo dang bu dang bu mo dang bral
188a3: ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzogs pas mgul sgra dang dang por 'gags bzhin 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la// ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas// des na ba be'u shi ba bzhin// skye bo med pa'i nags na du// de nas lha rnams
188a4: kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te/ rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ bskal bzangs bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi// bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'joms byed de// khyod kyis 'dul
188a5: ba'i mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis/ / bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis// de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags byin ma yid bde ba skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan stod ldan pa bdag gi bu// bran gyur pa
188a6: las thar mdzad cing / / mes po'i drung du phyin pa yang // sum cu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod// de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chen po bsti gan su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ngo // rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas byang
188a7: chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di// g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas// khyod kyis sus la'ang ma sbyin cig/ bzhag pa byin na sdang par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer bde
188a8: ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yin no snyam nas grong khyer de nyid du song ste bus pa gzhonu de dag bcod par brtsams pa de lta bur mongs par byas so/ / ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyod kyi dpon po mdog nag dang / dra ba

188b1: can dang de gnyis ni/ bram ze shin tum drangs pa// khrong byer mchog 'di bachod mchis// de nad ces thos nas rgyal po sems mi dga' nas smras pa/ gzhon gnyis mur du skyon cig/ bran po rnams kyis sang byung ba dang grong byer ba rnams myur du rgyal dos//
188b2: mdun du nye bar lhags nas/ ji tsam na thon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang // mi'i dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing // lus theg dri ma can gyi lus dang yis mthong nas ni// mod la seng ge khri las sa mi steng du lhung gyur te/
188b3: pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang ngu bar gyur// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams smras pa// gang zhig nags na gnas pa yang // byin la mngon pa'i dga' ba'i yid// mig bzangs de ni myur du 'dir// chung ma dang bcas dkrug par gyis// de nas
188b4: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / / phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'das pa dang / bram ze de dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams lhan cig pasti gnas der
188b5: sod nas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa btab ste/ rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go// de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to// des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / 'phongs
188b6: pa dang / mdza' bo dang // nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub don du gnyer ba yis// rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gdol/
188b7: pa g.yung po la'ang // 'jig pa med par sbyin pa gtang// gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang // rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang // de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin// chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// bu dang chung ma yongs btang bas
188b8: 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur// gang gi tshe rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis thams cad sgrol gyi ched du bramathe dzu dzu// la nor mang po sbyin pa de'i tshe de 'byor pa rgya chen por gyur pa dang / de la snying du sdug pa dang /
188b9: rtsalag dang grogs po dag 'ongs nas smras pa/ khyod kyis 'byor pa dang dpal dang bskal pa phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa/

189a1: ci yang rung de dag thams cad ni gzhonon du thams cad sbrel de la te de yin no// des smras pa/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi'o bo la ci zhig byas/ rigs mchog gi nang du skyes pas kho bo 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
189a2: sprul pa/ dge slong gajis pa dras pas/ de'i mi dris kyi gzhod dubs sa so ga na ba na nyid yin no// de ci de'i dris kyi drug gang yi pa de ni na sbyid 'a da yin te/ den yang 'di byas pa sa gzob dang byas pa ma tshor ba yod do// dgar yang dbyas par
189a3: gzob dang byas pa ma tshar ba yor ra/ / de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ byas pa gzob dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gsan par bya na mang po la lta smos kyang ci go te/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas com
189a4: ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe yul tsam pa na khyim bdag gru 'dzini zhes bya ba phyug pa nod mang po longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bul nor gyis 'akra/
189a5: pa zhig gnas te/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyad par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems cadang ldan 'gyur te/ 'di ltar
189a6: de'i ming la longs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra zur zad kyang mi thos shing grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang / drob na dro ba'i yo byad dang / sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ta la ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang skur ba ma yin pa dang / hacad lan cha cha ba ma yin pa dang ha cang
189a7: mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar kha ba dang snar ba dang / lan tsha dang mdar ba dang / tsha da bka baspangs pa'i kha zas kyi bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang / se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na tA ba ba'i na du khri'u
189a8: nas khri'u dang / khri nas khrir skur zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa// de'i tshe khyim bdag gru 'dzin dgos pa 'ga' zhig la rgyal po'i khab du song ngo // de yang zla ba dgu 'am/ bcu lon te rgyu skar gro zhin la bab pa na khye'u gzugs bzang po lta na sdug pa mdzes pa de'i rkang pa'i mthil

189b1: gnas la phrug ser gyi 'dog 'dra bsor gzhi tsas skyes bzhig bcas so/ / bcas das dzi naman byam pa dag zla 'dzin gyi mizhig ris pa rings par rgyal po labar song nas khyim bdag tha 'dzin la smras pa/ byas bdag dbyas paskyed cig/ khyod kyi byang 'gas
189b2: so/ / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig sgra/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so// de dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas yang dris pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig sla/ des smras pa/ byib bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so// des dris pa/
189b3: da rje zhig su/ de nas pa de 'di sa ma dusems te/ ci khyim bdag 'di yang nas yang du 'dra ba bdag la thal ka smra bar ma 'dod grang snyam dus leg cang mi smra bar 'dug go// byam bdag gas smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyis nyes te/ gal te khyod kyis lar btung smras par /
189b4: gyuraran yang / ngas kyang khyod kyi khagaser kyi lan brgya bkang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ de nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis mi de'i kha gser gyis lan gsum bkang nas 'dor ba la khye'u dkan dbang pa'i ra ni gser bye ba nyi shu byin cig ces spring ngo // khyim bdag gru 'dzin dga' ba dang /
189b5: yid bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag gi khye'u zhig btsas so// rgyal pos smras pa legs so// ngas de la tsam pa bzhi dang bcas pa dang / glang po che bdun gyi tshogs sbyin no// khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bltas te tsam par 'das
189b6: nas de nas byil bdag gigis rnams kyis nyi ma bdu gsum nyi shug tsi tu btsas pa'i bcas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u med cing gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do/ / gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khye'u 'di rmA kar gr-i zhan la btsas la 'di bcas pa na bas
189b7: kyang dkan dbab pa'i rini dragaser bye ba nyi shu byin pas/ de bas na bye'u'i mang 'gro zhir skyes bye ba nyi shu ba zhes bya bar gdags so// zhes de'i mang gro zhon skyer bye ba nyi shu ba zhes bya bar btags te/ khye grozhin skyes bya ba nyi shu ba ma ma brgyad rjes su ga dang pa na tshaba'i ma
189b8: ma gnyis dang nu ma ldan pa'i ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'byi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ de mam brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zhod dmar dang / 'un mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis skyed par byed/ srid par byed ci

190a1: ba/ / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed de/ de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / la gartsis dang / dbyung ba dang / gzhug pa dang / gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing brtag pa brgyad po gzhi btag pa dang / gos rtag
190a2: pa dang / rin po che brtag pa dang / shing brtag pa dang / glang po che brtag pa dang / rta btag pa dang / gzhon nu brtag pa dang / gzhon nu ma brtag pa dang / 'byed pa dang / klog pa la mkhas pa dang / g.yer por gyur to// de bsod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang ldan pa yin no// zhes rigs
190a3: mnyam pa mang pos thos nas bu sring dag byin no/ / de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang pa gsum po dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi rtsig tu bcug te chung ma gsum po chen mo dang / bar ma dang / tshun ma bzhag nas de steng gi khang bzangs gzhir song ste skyes pa med pa na rtse bar
190a4: byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo mod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ro// lha sbyin gyi gzhon nu ma skyes sgral spang pa gzhon nu rgyal po thams cad ni gang gi tshe sgra skye bo skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu'i thu bo shos rgyal srid kyi
190a5: dbang phyug la gzhag nas rab tu 'byung na/ khyod kyi yab ni sgra kha dog rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar byin na'o/ kyang 'dod pa rnams la zhen bzhin te nyo bar zhi bar mi 'gro'o// ma skyes dgras smras pa de nyid kyis shes mod de la ci byar yod/ lha sbyin gyi sbas pa/ pha rol gdon pa gyis shig
190a6: 'dod pa don du gnyer ba rnams ni ma byed pa ci yang med pas ji tsam na rtul po gzugs car snying po bcom ldan 'das mar gsol nas 'jams gsol bar gzhad pa'i 'arnams kyi zhal ta byas te/ 'od nga'i tshal du song ba pa skyes dazas mthong nas de rdo rje rje ci
190a7: pa zhig 'phangs pa dang rgyal po sgra la mkhas pa yin pas des g.yon phyogs su thug pa'i rje'u chag par gyur nas de nyid nas slar log go/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta bu mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ rnam par mi
190a8: mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo gas gyi bu ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i gshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis zin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms ma rung bar byas kyis tsam par

190b1: gru 'dzin gyi bu'i dru ra gsod snyoms khyer te shog shig/ btsum pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa myod kyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas di ltar sems mnyam par gzhag ni rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar byin pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
190b2: bar zhugs so/ / gre zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa nyi ma la dad pas de nyi ma re re zhe de nang par sngar langs te nyi ma la phyag byed pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brtol nas babs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gro kini skyes bye ba nyi shu pas mthong ngo // mthong
190b3: nas kyang bdag gi mngon sum kho nar nyi ma nyid kyis gzugs mthong ngo snyam nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ nyi ma brtol nas sa snyed mngon phyogs myur nyid du// ba dag gi gnas su byon pa 'di ko su zhig lags/ 'di ci nyi ma'am nor
190b4: sbyin zla ba 'am brgya byin ma/ / 'on te lha yi bdag po mod la gshegs shig gu/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis kyang de'i bsam pa shes nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo 'od gi 'od zer stong gi 'od 'bar nya ma ma yin rgyu skar bdag po mini/ kho bo rnam thos ma yin
190b5: mchog ldan ma yon legs pa'i brtul zhugs dbang phyug ma ni/ kho bo thugs zhig zi rjid kyis 'bar sangs rgyas sras po yin par shes par byos/ kho bo thub la bsod snyoms dgongs nas spang ba'i phyir ni khyod kyi drang du 'ongs/ gro zhini skyes kyis smras pa/ ci shes ldan nyid tu
190b6: pa yin nam/ ces tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar gser gyi ri bo lhun po'i zlar ni yungs dag khyer te 'ong ba dang / ji ltar nyi ma'i zlar ni sa steng srog chags srin bu me khyer 'jal ba dang / rin chen gyi phyug rgya mtsho'i zlar ni 'di ni gnag gi rmig rjes spyan pa lta/ de bzhin/ mi mchog
190b7: bla ma sangs rgyas la ltos ston pa'i sras dag rig par gyi/ gzhin skyes kyis sbas pa/ rjes su dpag pa 'di yis ni/ bdag gis khyod kyi 'dren pa ni/ ltar dka'athub rab che ba gsal bar rab tu rtogs lags so// dgos pa cil byon dga' drol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
190b8: bsod snyoms bral cig/ bcom ldan 'das de su yin/ khyim bdag gi 'u dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub

191a1: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod do/ / khyim bdag gi bu de ni sangs rgyas shes bya'o// des sangs rgya she bya'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu'i khung thams cad g.yos shing mngon par dang ba des snod du bcos pa wak+Sha rta po de nyid tshe dang ldan pa maud gal bya
191a2: chen po la phul lo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de las bsod snyoms blangs nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na tsam pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshel bya ka lan da ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
191a3: des bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol bar brtsams pa na/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos snod nas bcos pa bye mi shos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / rnga tsam na 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kha zas kyi dri zhim
191a4: po rnam pas tshogs kyis khyab par mthong nas des bsams pa gdon mi za bar lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin nam/ lha gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te/ 'di ltar 'od ma 'tshal 'di 'a zas kyi drizhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur to// snyam du
191a5: bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin nam/ lha gzhan dag gis bsod snyoms bul ba'am ci lags na/ 'ad ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di zhal zas kyi gri ganga' ba sna tshogs kyis khyang par gyur lags/
191a6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis kyang ma yin la/ lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang maphul te/ de lta mod kyi khyod nyid kyi yul tsam pa na gu 'dzin gyi bu nyi ma re re lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ba yod de/ de las dge slong maud
191a7: gal gyi bus blangs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i bsngags pa gsung brtsams pa thos nas de yang mthong bar 'dod pa smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can ni sod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang ldan pa
191a8: yin pas khyod bsod nams yongs su zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis de la bka' stsol cig/ de lta mod kyi rgyal po chen po lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la longs spyod cig/ des gsol pa/ brdzun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur lags te/ sngon ni su'i lhung gzed kyi lhag ma

191b1: yang 'tshal lags mod kyi bcom ldan 'das ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi yab lags pas gang te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na longs spyod par bgyi'o zhes des longs spyod par brtsams so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang
191b2: bza' ba dang btud pa 'di 'dra ba longs spyod dam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag kyang rgyal po'i rgyud du bcas/ rgyal po'i rgyud las chen por gyur cing rgyal por gyur kyang g.yang zas dang btung ba 'di'i dra ba ni sngon lan 'ga' yang myong bar ma 'tshal lags so//
191b3: rgyal po chen po sems can skal pa chen po de ni 'di ltar 'di 'dra ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba la longs spyod do// de nas ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom 'das kyi spyan snga nas sod nas
191b4: des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag yul tsam par 'dod gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig/ ci'i slad du lagaso// gru'i dzin gyi bu blta'o// lha'i yul na de mchis pas de nyid dgug tu gsol/ de ni sems can bsod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang
191b5: ldan pa yin pas de bka' ma stsol to/ / lha ji ltar bka' ma stsal kyang bdag cag gis mchi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o de bzhin du gyis shig/ de rnams kyis tsam par yi ge spring pa shes ldan dag rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur gyis grong khyer byi dor gyis shig/ rtsa dang chas dag
191b6: sa gon gyis shig ces spring ba de rnams kyis thos nas shin du dga' bar gyur pa dang yang yi ge spang ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po ni mi gshegs mod kyi gzhon nu gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes spring ba dang / de rnams skrag te gzhon nu gtum po lan 'ga' zhig 'ongs na yang
191b7: gnod par 'gyur ro snyam nas yang spring ba/ rgyal po yang mi gshegs gzhon nu yang mi gshegs te/ de lta mod kyi khyed kyis gang 'ga' ji ltar rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'bab pa de ltar gags rtsigs shig ces spring ba thos nas tsam pa na gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi mi rnams 'dus nas
191b8: shas ldan dag gdon ma ze bar rgyal po ni bdag cag la chang pa gcad par gzhed pas des na yi ge 'di skad spring mod ces de rnams kyis blon po rnams la don de spring ba dang / de rnams kyis lags te yang drang por spring ba/ shes ldan dag 'di na bden pa yin te/ rgyal po dang gzhon nu yang

192a1: mi gshegs la/ gang gA bgags pa yang dgos pa cung zad kyang med do// de lta mod kyi lha ni gru 'dzin gyi bu blta bar gzhed de zhes spring pa dang / de rnams kyi nyan rna ba'i mo zhig mngags so// des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do// de nas de rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag
192a2: gru 'dzin gyi drung du song nas khyim bdag lha gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa blta bar gshed nas blon po rnams kyis bdag la drang por spring ste/ nyan rna ba'i mis kyang don de nyid smras na// 'di thong shig/ des spras/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i gags kyi rgal pa gang yin pa gser gyi go dbus
192a3: rtsig kyang blo'i me gtong ngo / / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te de lta yin du zin kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse bar gyis shig des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyed cag gi bu rnams kyang gro zhen skyes dang lhan cig
192a4: gtod blta na gtad do/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bgyi'o// 'o na shes ldan dag deng shig/ khyim bdag gu 'dzin gro zhi na skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gro zhini skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu grang ma 'di dag 'di skad ces zer ro//
192a5: des smras pa/ yab gal te de lta na mchi'o// bu gdon mi za bar rgyal po de khyod kyi rkang mthil gyi bu gsar gyi kha dog can blta bar 'dod kyis rgyal po de dag ni gnas ma yin par khro bas khyod pa gnod par bkrur du 'ong gis khyod kyis rkang pa gteg te de ya bstan pang ni byigi/ 'di re ru
192a6: tig par ba'i rgyal po de'i zhabs kyi rung du shog la phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar kyil mo krung chos te 'dug shig dang / des na snga rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi bsams pa/ bronani skyes gzhon pa gang gis gtang ci glang po mang gzhon pas sam/ ti gzhon
192a7: bsasam/ shing rta gnon pasas ma'on bung gzhon pas snyam pa las de 'di nyam dus mas te/ 'di ga gnang da krung bzhin pa mchog ni pas klu bzhon pas gtang ngo // gam du bsams nas des chu ba gang thal bu keng sa nas de keng po tshal nas pa d+ma chogs bye
192a8: bcug te/ me tog dang bras rnam pa sna tshags dang ldan zhing ngad ba dang / thung byung dang / rabya dang / ni tso dang / ri stegs dang / kha byug lasogs pa bya rnams gang 'byin cing rol mo'i cha byang sa tshogs dang / bad med rgyan ga tshogs kyis klubs pa dag 'dug du bcug te/ 'byor ba des

192b1: srig nas gtangango / / dang kyis rgyal ba'i lab bar byan pa/ rgyal po gzugs can nyi pos kyu 'dzin mthu 'ang shes thos nas des rgyal po bab nas gang shA' 'bab na ba dang thos bgos nas nus pagang ste nang sa grangs so// rnam pa la
192b2: yang rdo ba dang / bsag ma dang / gyo mogs la cing can dan gyis chus cag chag btag drags po'i bag por gzhag/ rang gyi rkun snang mang po btags/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan btsugs me tog sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dag 'tshal gyi phyed mos tsam bzhin dung ga 'dag
192b3: byas te/ de 'byor ba des nyal po'i bab kyi grong byer du brid do// de nas rgyal po seng ge'i gril 'dug pa'i nang pa'i drung du mu tig gi 'phreng ba bkag nas mgo bos phyag byas te mdun du skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gser gyi ba dog 'dra ba'i
192b4: yod pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang kye ma gro ga ni skyes bye ba ni shu ba ni bsod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// mthong nas smras pa/ grozhon skyes khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ngam/ lha ma mthong lags so// tshur shog 'dong ngo // ngas dris
192b5: pa lta ci bcom ldan 'das gzhon pas gshegs sam/ 'on te zhabs gnyis lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de rab tu bung ba yin na de la bzhon pas ci bya/ des smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag kyang sug pa kho nas mchi'o zhes de rkang pa kho nas chas pa na/ de'i zho gas 'tsho ba rnams
192b6: kyis sa la gos dag gting ba dang / des smras pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das gding ba las bzhad dam/ 'on te gding ba med par gzhung / de rnams kyis smras pa/ gding ba med par bzud do// des smras pa/ gding pa sus shig/ bdag kyang gding ba med par 'gro'o// kogs 'tsho ba nas
192b7: kyis gos rnams bsdus pa dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis gting nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas byed cag la ma bzlog gam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bzlog lags so// 'o na yang su zhig gis gnyid/ lha khyod bsod nams kyi rgal pa chen po mdab bas ma ma yin pan
192b8: byas btid lags grang / des snying nas tshig du smras pa/ mi ma yin pa dag gos rnams sdus shig/ de rnams kyis bsdus nas rkang pas la gzhag pa nas chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yas/ ldeg rab tuwe/

193a1: kun du rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ shar phyogs mthon nub stsogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shang phyogs dpa'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dam byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dpa' mtha' mthon bus dmal dbus mthon mtha' dpa' bar byur /
193a2: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slo dag 'di nas bzung ste ga/ la pa dgra bcu rtsa gcig ga bang du du 'dzin pa bris pan ga' yang gding pa med par rkang pas la ma yong / dag song ba yang tsas la gras pas yin ci bsod nams
193a3: su zad pa ni ma yin te/ des nas 'di rnam pa drug tu gsos par gyur to// de nas gron na skyes bye ba nyi shu ba bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song sa phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// debs bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi
193a4: bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / lnga dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad pas gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu bas 'dzag tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes
193a5: nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong ba dang / de stan la langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga// ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par
193a6: gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na bdag bcom ldan gyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
193a7: nyan thos rnams ni thams ma gnang ba'i rigs kyi bu rab tu 'byin pa dang de/ pa rdzogs par mi byed kyis songal pa dang mal rtogs shig/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni rten pa thams cad kyi dpon po lags te don du 'dini chos nyid kyis bdag gi du lags pas 'ang
193a8: bdag gis gnang lags kyis bcom ldan 'das ci legs su rab tu dbyung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag kho nar sa

193b1: byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te swa dang kha sru zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / 'o ba rgyalon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ s+thA bya stepa/
193b2: sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing/ 'od la dbang por bzhir gnas gyur/ te sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ drug sde rnams kyis de la tso dri bar brtsams pa/ re shig snyan pa la ni gcig tu brtson par bya dgongs pa yi na/ yang sar gyi gong
193b3: 'dis khyad par ci zhig rtogs par 'gyur zhes de rnams kyis de tse dris pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste byi ni nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gcig tu brtson pa
193b4: rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs pa gang lags/ tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes 'chag pas thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal gyul to// des gsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrong du song te chags byas nas
193b5: de na tshe dang ldan pa gro zhini skyes bye ba nyi shu ba rgyal po'i lab gyi gsale ba'i tshal gyi dung khrod du gnas nas rtag tu 'grus pa dang ldan par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pa'i sgob pas gnas so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro nini skyes
193b6: ba nyi shu pa gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag gzhag pa na sems la sems kyis rnam par rtog pa 'di snyam du skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yid na/
193b7: 'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar mgyur gyis/ bdag ginyi du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas/ mal bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing spyan pa dag sbyin pa sod nams dag bya'o snyam po/ nas pa
193b8: ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa gro zhini skyes bya ba nyi shu ba'i bsam pa mkhyen nas dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog/ khyong gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba gangan ba der song la byin nas gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa khyod

194a1: la ston pa gsung ngo zhes sgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong des bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba gang na ba der song ste byin nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tsha dang
194a2: ldan pa gro zhi ni skyes byed la ston pa gsung ngo / / tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa gro zhi ni skyes bye ba nyi shu pas dge slong de las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
194a3: phyogs cig tu 'gag/ phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pagrozhin skyes bye ba nya gru pa la'ang med ces bka' sum to// grazhon rjes snod cig 'daban par yod te/ nang du yang dag gzhag
194a4: na sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed pa de rnams kyi nang na bad/ mchog yin na/ 'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur
194a5: gyis/ bdag gi nye du rnams longs spyod rgya chen po yod pa ma bdag 'ag la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin bdag sbyin// bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa skyes par gyur tam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhi ni skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom
194a6: ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to/ / snyam du bsams nas 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang skyobs pa spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de lta
194a7: lags so/ / ba'i phyir gro zhin skyes khyod la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin de'i lan thob shig/ gro zhini skyes ji snyam du sams/ khyod sngon byim par gyur pa na pi bar gi rmad kyi sbal mkhas pa yin nam/ bdun
194a8: pang dag sngon khyim par gyur pa na ba bdag chud kyi sgra la mkhas pa mang lags so/ / grozhin skyes ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe bi bang rgyud shin bsdams par gyur pa de'i mjig pa ba gi ska snyan par 'gyur ba'am/ sgra yi

194b1: nga ba 'am/ slang ldan pa'am/ las su rung bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so// 'o na gang gi tshe bi bad gi rgyud lhag par lhod par gyur pa de'i tshe rdeg pi bdagi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba'am/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa'am/ la su rung bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so// gang gi tshe bai zeng gi rgyud shin du bsdams pa ma yin
194b2: zhing lhag par lhong pa ma yin par gyur te nA ngan par 'dug pa de'i tshe bi bidagi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba'am/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa'am/ las su ru bar 'gyur ba ma yin na pa/ btsun pa de lha lags so// gro zhini skyes de bzhin du ha cang brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni rgod par 'gyur ro// haH shan na ni rnam par
194b3: ga gro na sas de lta bas na myod kyis ngan shi rtogs par byaste/ des kyangang rgyal dun gyi'i del yang bag yod par gdam mtshan ma yang gzung ba bya tho ni tus byod gnas pa 'dis gnas na ring po mi thogs pa 'on zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa rnam par grol ba
194b4: mangs dang rnam par gro ba shes bamathong 'chos nyid la nga ga yon shes bas mngon tum byas nas rdogs pa byas te ga'i gyib na do/ / sa par spyod pa parten to/ byur byas so med pa dis banan migs so// rtogs par gyur/ nas chod can tho na ste bye ti thababacom ldan rab kyis ga
194b5: par mdo yang dag ste rjesu ying nga nas bcod ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis pa mgo bas phyag rgyas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pib ga dbangar 'dis tshe dang ldan pagro zhi ni skyes la gdams dag thog nas gcig bu dben pa g.yod brkun pa dang ldan pa dag di gtong bar gnas so// gcig bu de
194b6: babag yod pa rkun pa dang ldanapa bdag nyid gtong par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams sgra dang / 'aspu bregs te gos du sdig gos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas byi ma med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bran med pa de'i tshe de nyid la nga gi man ma ma du byas ste bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa
194b7: bsted do/ khur byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan ri shes so go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de kun shes par 'gyur te/ sems shin du nam par gro pa'i dgra tsam par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhini skyes bye ba nyi shu b.rad/ bcom pa thob ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dag pa'i bde nyams myong nas de 'dis ma dris pas te/ dag ma ldan 'das bang ste/
194b8: btu bya'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ni 'di min no sum nas de nas tshe dang ldan pagro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba dgong sa kanang du yang dag 'jog las langs te bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mag bos phyag byas te phyogs ni ga du go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe nga
194b9: ldan pabagro ni ni skyes bye ba nyi shu pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pazag pazar pa bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa 'u so bdag / don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyar ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de de'i tshig nas drug la mos par 'gyur te/ des

195a1: bang 'ang bal bos pa srung ba lags/ bco bam macas pa la dzes par byang ba lags/ ra tud ngan pal bas par thang ba lags/ med pa pa pa dang / len pa pad pa dang / mabarjed pa'i mams lams par tu pa 'as
195a2: na pa 'did pacig 'di snyam du bye ma co dang ldan pa 'di dang btsam khon la gdas pas nges par 'byung ba la mas sa skyem dumams na/ bdun pa de ltar ba pangar mab ste/ 'dod la zad pa dang / shesang da ba dang / gnyisas padapas nges par 'aspang ba
195a3: 'brur lags so/ / btsun pa 'din bcig 'di snyas dbyer tshe dang ldan pa 'di tshul khrims tsas 'on la brten nas mi 'tshe ba la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar ma gyis/ 'dod dgas zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti ga zang pas me tshor
195a4: mos par 'gyur ba lags so/ / btsun pa 'dir kha cag 'di snyam du kye mtsho dang ldan pa 'di rnyed pa dang bkung sti dang / chags su bcad pa tsam khon tshol ba'i slad du rab tu dben pa la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhes
195a5: zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / len pa zad pa las mi brjed pa'i sems la yang mos par 'gyur ba lags te/ btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du
195a6: sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de de'i tshe dganas drug po 'di dag la mos par 'gyur ba lags so// btsun pa dge slong slob po gang yin pa thob pa gang lags pa dag dmi'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das/
195a7: bdon du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gangs te/ de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / slob pa'i dang po dang ldan pa lags so// dengs gzhan na zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong pa'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon
195a8: par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te sgrubs nas bdag gi skye bzad do/ / tshangs par spyod la bsten to// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes sgrogs pa de'i tshe ni de mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi slob pa'i dbang po rnams dang ldan lags so//

195b1: 'dul bar ni/ bas po brgya rtsa gcig pa/ btsun pa dper na bus pa gzhon du chung ngu zhan pa gan rgyal du nyal ba de ni de'i mabyis pa'i dang tshul dang / byis pa'i dbang po rnams dang ldan lags la/ da dus ga'adan chen por gyur ba'i dus dbang pa rnams dang /
195b2: su smin pa de'i tshe na chen po'i ngang tshul dang / chen po'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so// btsun pa de bzhin du dge slong slob pa yid ma thob pa gang lags pa dgong ma 'grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la don du gnyer ba'i tshul la la dmang druganas te/ de da'i tsha slab pa'i
195b3: xxx/ xxx
195b4: tshangs par spyod par len no/ / bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhad mi shes so nas stsogs pa dang tshan dem slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi slo ba pa'i dbang po dang ldan lags so// gal tede'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams gal shing du sdang bar byu ba
195b5: de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par me 'brur te/ de'i sems phyin cim log pa shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shin tesnyoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o// gal te de'i rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra
195b6: rnams dang / sngas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / les rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnam pa yid la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam pa log pa'i sems dang /
195b7: rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te de'i sems phyin cim log pa/ shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shin du sgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o// btsun pa dper na grong khyer ram/ grong rdal dang ha cang yang mig mi rang ba zhig na
195b8: brag chen pos ngag ma mchis pa/ shan tu sa khregs pa cig tu 'thas pa zhig mchis na/ de la gal te shar phyogs nas rlung gishugs drag pos langs kyang de g.yos par mi 'gyur/ de 'gul bar ma 'gyur zhing / de na ba phyogs su bzung bar mi dus lags so// gal te lho grogs

196a1: dang phyogs / byang phyogs nas drung gi shugs drug po langs kyang de gsos par mi 'byung / de 'dul bar mi 'gyur zhing lto phyogs su bkung bar mi nus lags te/ gang nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang des de g.yos par mi 'byung / de 'gul ba ma
196a2: 'byung zhing de gar du yang bkrung bar ma nus lags so/ / de bzhin dugal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mig la shing du snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur/ de'i sems byin tsam log ga/
196a3: shin du rnam par thol ba/ shin tu sgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o// gal te de'i rnabs nam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sngas rnam par shes par bya ba'i rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ngo rnams dang / lus kyis rnam
196a4: par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin du snang bar gyur kyang de'i dam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ de'i sems byin tsam log pa/ shin tu rnas par grol ba/ shan du
196a5: sgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su lta'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas/ de skad ces gsol nas gnas rten dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// nges par 'byung la mos pa dang / sems ni 'chi ba med pa dang / rab tu
196a6: dben la mos pa dang / / sred pa zad la dga' ba dang / len pa zad la mos pa dang // sems ni brjed pa med gyur pa// skye mched skye ba shes nas su// sems ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur// de nas sems ni mgrel zhing // sems zhi ba yi skyo ba yis// bya ba dag ni byas zin pas//
196a7: bya ba yod pa ma yin no// ji ltar drag gi ri bo la// rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos pa// de bzhin sdug dang mi sdug pa'i// gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang // dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos kyis skyob pa mi g.ye ste/ bkrir mi btub pa'i sems bcas sho// de la'ang zad par rjes su ldan//
196a8: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bya ba nyi shu bas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing ner mang ba longs spyod che ze'i rigs su skyes shing rkang pa'i

196b1: gnyis su spugaser gyi ba dog 'dra ba skyes pa dang / gdugs re shing lnga bcu'i ston mo smon pasgol zhing sbyor ba dang / 'di nas bzung stegal ba dgu bcucu gcig gi bar du na 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bzhag pa dang / btsas ma thag tu
196b2: dag bab pa'i rin gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyan mongs pa thams cad srangs te dgra som pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gro zhi ni skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs
196b3: da ba na yongs su su rag 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas gre zhini skyes 'di nyi de mis las byas zhing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so so myong bar krur / dge slong ga pas byas shing bsags pa dag ni byi ngos gyis nims
196b4: mnam par kwin pa ma gUng / chu'i 'ams la mi grug po 'bas pa mi byung / rlung gi Shams la mi gyur gyi 'di ltar bas dge ba dang mi dge byas shing babags bdag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / yas dang / rkye mched rnabs pa rnam par smin par gyur / sa rnams rnal pa gyur yang ni// chud miza ba 'a tshogs dang
196b5: dug/ na lus can mas pa ni// 'bras bu dag tu byung ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu du gcig na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa bde ba gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i b.lo sbyar ba/ blan med
196b6: gzhadang mirnams kyi seM na gsangs byas bcom ldan das rnas par gzishes shes bya bathung ste/ de dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i bro brang ba shes ldan gis bya bar gshegs so// rgyal po'i bro brang bshes ldanan dga'
196b7: sder ba dmang po gas te/ de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dge slong drug zi nyis stod gis yongs su bskor de ljongs rgyu shing gshegs pa na 'dir byon te zhes thoso// thos nas kyang thams cad 'dus te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sadus rnam pad ga cigs
196b8: ngan ba der dong ste rtags nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ng+yas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ng+yas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rnams pa chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dab

197a1: ston par ma dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag pa gze stod par mdzad/ yang dag par ra dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mang chos dang ldan pa'i gtas kyis yang dag pa nga// yang dag par 'dzin du bcun/ yang gapa gzang stong/
197a2: yang dag par ba tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas dga' sder ba tu mang po stan las langs te nags zag pa gcig tugazang nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gdan ba de lags su thal mo sbyang ba ba drang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
197a3: marnas pa sa la 'das a nas/ com ldan las dge slong gi she su gas pad da nga rgyag sa bdun pa tshas gas dang / gcod snyoms dang/ gas da/ kun kyin can / yorgya pas stong ni ma nas
197a4: mdzad du gsol/ yang / yang rdzog pa sa marnam par gzigs kyi dag la du mang po rnams la cang migs ba gnang ngo // denas dga' sde ba tu mang thos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gcishes cad migs bzhan ya gnas bcom lda
197a5: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag/ byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas 'dun khang du 'dus te thos bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'as
197a6: ji lung gdugs tshod gsol bar bya/ ci 'dus te bya'am/ 'on te re nges bya/ de na kha cig gas smras pa/ nyi ma reng zhing 'dus te gdugs tshod gsol na bdag cag ga zhing zas kyi satha' nas par cad du 'byung bas shes ldan gagal te 'dod na mos gdugs tshad gsol/
197a7: bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rims spyi blangs las ston mo bya bar brtsams te/ 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin bdag nyid kyi yang ston par byed do// de nas dga' sde rnams kyi ning na bram ze'i khye'u bkren pa zhig yod pa de sa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ yus sha' sde rnams kyi khrimasas bcas pa
197a8: rims ra mos bcom ldan 'das gdugasu tshod gsol bur bya'o/ / zhes bcas na/ de la bdag gis 'byor pa ni wang na bdag gis ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar brtsi/ des smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na khyod kyis nyi ma tham zud la dus de'i bar du cung zad sbungs shig/ tshogs kyi rgyu lhag kyang drang zang

197b1: rnyed grang/ des nyi ma tha ma gzung nas de na tshogs kyi rgya lhag pa rab tu mang po yod pa dang / des kyang cung zad sgrubs nas de nas des gnas khang rtsig tu bcug ste/ der dgos rnams bting nas grwa rnams su kang sha ba Ni lnga lnga bzhag/ de la ngos lpags shig bdog pa de yang gnas
197b2: khang gi sgong gting ngo / / de nas lnga rgya ston pa sdong du bcos shing srang na ba kang sti chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la gdugs tshod gsol te zhabs la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa// ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phrag cing nor mngal longs spyod
197b3: che ba'i rigs su skye zhing lan 'ga' yang gding pa ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa mi 'jog pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis la sku gser gyi kha dog 'du ba sor bzhi tsam 'khrungs pa ji 'dra ba de lta bur bdag gi yang de dang 'dra ba dang yon tan
197b4: 'di lta bu dag kyang thob cing / ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur gyis mi mnyes par bgyid par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dga' sde'i bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par
197b5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la bya ba bas shing smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pas phyug cing nor mad la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la sku gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam skyes pa dang / 'di nas gzung ste/ bskal pa dgu bcu
197b6: tu gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang 'dis med pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bor ba dang / btsas pa na yang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing / nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag
197b7: de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi na 'dren ma yin pas/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las cig tu gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las cig
197b8: tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar sgrub par bya'o// gang gi tshe ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis zin pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i grong ma rnams kyis 'phya bar

198a1: brtsams te/ de na kha cig ni rgyal po la mi snad pa sgrogs par byed de/ 'di ma btsas pa nyid nas yab la dgrar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstanan/ ci'i phyir ma btsas pa nyid du ma bsad/ gzhan dgagis smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgya lang te ni thams cad kyi lung bltar pa
198a2: bden par 'gyur rab/ gzhon nu nyid dul ba yin mod kyi 'on kyang lha sbyin mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis smras nas des dbya ba ngan pa la shin du zhugs par gyur to// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po dang lha sbyin gyis kyang mnyes te/ 'on skyer bring nge 'jig rten gyi
198a3: khams kyi bar du mi bdag par 'di ltar rab tu 'byin par mdzad pas na bcom ldan 'das lo nas nongs so/ / kha cig gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mnongs te/ de gang gi phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las ma byas pas dge 'dun gyis nyes so// de nas gang dag rgyal po la
198a4: mi snyan par sgrogs pa des rgyal po ngo tsha bar mi byed kyi/ sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams su bdag gis las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa yin no snyam mo// gang dag bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa sgrogs pa des ni rgyal po shin tu ngo tsha bar byed de/ bdag gis lus ngan pa gang
198a5: yin pa dang 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun gyi mi snyan pa brjod do snyam mo/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nongs pa gzhan gyis bgyis la skyon gzhan la sgo ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
198a6: bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma chad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nyes pa gzhan gyis byas la skyon gzhan la sgos pa nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sIn rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang /
198a7: bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de la khyi gnyis zhig yod pa 'gram dang nye 'gram zhes bya ste/ de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i rta bral gyi cha spyad 'chos so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rengs sbyin dram la chab na des
198a8: blon pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag tu khrab kyi yo byad ltos shig/ de rnams kyis blta bar brtsams pa na thams cad bcad cing rab tu gtubs par mthong nas de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha rta khrab kyi cha spyad zhe na rnams kyis 'tshal te// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag

198b1: gal te de lta na ngas kyi rnams yongs su spangs so/ / de na kha cig ni gsad do// kha cig ni bros so// ji tsam na yul gzhan gyi phyi zhig yul nas bA rA Na sir 'ong ba na des de rnams 'bros pa mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir byed 'di ltar skrag/ de rnams kyis
198b2: ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa da des smras pa/ khyed ci'i phyir rgyal po la gsol bar ma byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhan dag ni kha btag/ kho bo cag ni bros na rgyal po la gsol bar bya ba'i gtel ga la yod/ des smras pa/ 'dug shig dang khyed kyi don du kho bos
198b3: rgyal po la gsol bya'o/ / des de rnams dbugs phyung nas slar log pa dang / de nas des rgyun lugs tshad tsam na thos pa'i nyen kor du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ rgyal po'i bab na zhes gnyis mchis pa 'gram dang ni/ nye 'gram stobs dang kha dog ldan pa
198b4: gang lags pa/ / de 'dir dgu ma rgyu bdag cag dgum pa'i rgyu ma lags// lha cig dgu ma rgyum lags bkum pa rigs pa mid// rgyal pos thos nas des nam langs pa dang blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag mdang sum de la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa byed pa gang
198b5: yin pa de col cig/ de rnams kyis sku srungs rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag ma dang sum lha la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa de tshol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yul gyi gyi lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci 'gram dang nye 'gram gyis zos
198b6: sam 'on te/ khyi gzhan rnams kyis yin rtogs shig/ blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag lhas 'di skad ces kyi rnams rtogs shig ces bka' stsal na/ de rnams la ji ltar rtag par bya/ gzhan dgags smras pa/ de la gzhan rtag tu ci yod
198b7: grwa'i zlum po byin te sdug gzhug mod/ de rnams kyis skra'i thub po byid te sdug tu bcug pa las/ ji tsam na 'grab dang nye 'grab gnyis ko ba 'dum bur skyugs nas rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos dag nyis spangs te/ lhag ma rnamasal me 'jigs pa byed na
198b8: dge slong dag ji snyam des mas/ de'i tshe nga'i dus kyi 'grab dang nye 'gra ba gang yin bdag nyis ni lha sbyin dang / ma skyes dgra 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la gyod gzhan la bsgo'o// de ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyod gzhan bas

199a1: gzhan yang ji ltar lha sbyin byas pa me gzo ba dang byas pa me tshor ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// ji tsam na mi zhig sta re dang khung shing thogs te shad
199a2: gaphyir nags khrod du song nas/ de de na shing tshol bar byed pa na seng ges skrag nas bres pa las su 'khung zhig tu lhung ngo // seng ges kyang de bza' ba'i bsam pas de nyid du lhung ngo // sbrul zhig gis byi ba zhig skrag nas zes bya dang / khras byi ba bza' ba'i phyir snyags pa
199a3: las/ ci tsam na thams cad sur khung du lhung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig la gcig gsad par 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa dang seng ges smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed thams cad kho bo'i bgrod pa yin te/ de lta mod kyi bdag cag sdug sngal mi bzad pa dag pa thob papa
199a4: 'di ni gnod par bya ba'i dus ma yin gyis ma 'bul bar 'khod cig/ stes dang gis rngon pa zhig ri dgas rnams tshol zhing phyogs dang byin pa dang / des sur gang de blta bar brtsams pa las/ de rnams kyis btabs pa'i tshig gi smras pa/ kye nang rje skyabs kyis shig/ de nas rngon pa
199a5: des shes nas thog mar ser ges phyung ba dang / des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ khyod kyi drin gzo bar bya ste/ 'on kyang 'di na mgo nag po gnas pa de ni byas pa chud gson pa yin gyis khyod kyis ma dbyung shig ces smras nas song ngo // ji tsam na rngon pa des thams cad mthar gyis phyung do//
199a6: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ges ri dgas shig bsad pa dang rngon pa de yang phyogs deng phyin pa seng ges de ro shes nas rngon pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te ri dgas de byin no// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin btsun mo dang lhan cig bskyed mos tshal gyi ser sor nas des skyed mos tshal
199a7: dang bde ba nyangs su myong bar byas nas gnyid kyis log go/ / btsun mo bud med rnams kyang ga yangs su gnas pas gos dag bud de gams/ rgyan dag yol nas phyogs dag tu bzhag ta pyad mos tshal na 'chag par byed/ 'jug par byed/ nyal bar byed/ gnyid log par byed do/ ji tsam
199a8: na btsun mo zhig rgyan rnams bkrol te phyogs zhig tu bzhag nas gnyid log pa dang khras de blangs nas rngon pa de la byas pa'i phyir byin no/ / rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis snyom pa bsal nas myur ba myur ba ra bA rA Na sIr zhugs so// btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / krong mi dang / yul

199b1: mi rnams kyang rings par deng ngo / / ji tsam na btsun mo des rgyan btsal ba las ma rnyed nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal du bdag gi rkyen stong lags so// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rgyan stor gyis su yis khyer tshol cig/ de rnams
199b2: kyis pa tsal bar brtsams pa nam gnag po sngon pa'i drung du dus dus su 'gro bas de de'i khyim du song pa nams nam las de la rgyan yod par shes nas/ byas pa chud gzon pa des rgyal po'i drung du sod nas gsol ba dang / de nas rgyal po mchog tu khros ta rgyal po'i mi rnams
199b3: kyis rngon pa bkugs nas smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis skyed mos tshal nas rgyan rkus so// de nas de brag nas rdzi ltar gyur pa smras te/ rgyan dargyal po la phul na/ 'on kyang mi de 'acings nas btson rang bzhag go/ byi bas song nas sbal la smras pa/ mgonag po sdig pa byed pa das
199b4: mabyanas pa ga cag gdag pa'i bshas gnyen rgyal bas bcings nas bcon dang bzhag/ sbrul gyis smras pa/ dzan pa dang bdag gis rgyal po la zin par byas myod ma rdzags kyi ga dang ldan dig/ gas gsas shig dang / de ltar na rgyal po dga' nas khyod gdon me zabar da
199b5: nas longs spyod kyang bko bsha' byed par 'gyur ro/ / des smras pa legs kyi de bzhin gyis shig/ sbrul gyis tal po zin pa dang rngon pas song ste sngags dang sman de dag gis gsos so// de nas rgyal po mgu nas brtson las btang ste longs spyod dag gi bgo bsha' yang byas so//
199b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin na// de'i tshe da'i das kyi byas chud gsod pa gang yin par ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi chod pa yin no/ ltar
199b7: yang de byas pa mi bzo ba nga byas pa mi tshang ba yin no/ / gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyen cig/ dge slong dag sngon drung ba dus ma yin par zhag bdun du smin chags te lhas chang rab nas na'al zhig kye 'i tshar du zhugs so// sbrul zhag kyang nga
199b8: bas skraganas pan tshun rdza na nyid du zhugs so/ / rje tsam na na thu la des bye ba de gas bar brtsams pa na sbal gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag padag cag drug brdzab mi bzod pa dag pa thob kyis gcig la gcig gnod pa ma byed par ma 'gul bar 'bod cig/ den sbrul bya ring ni

200a1: dga' sde zhes bya'o/ / ne'u le'i ming ni dga' bo zhes bya'o// byi ba'i ming ni gang gas byin no zhes bya'o// dga' sde dang / dga' bos gang gas byin la smras pa/ khyod 'ja ba cing seng la bdag cag gis kha zas tshol cig/ de drang zhing bsam pa bzang ba
200a2: yin pas de gnyis kyi cheng du snying nas kha zas btsal bar brtsams pa na/ ma rnyed de// dga' sde la smras pa/ gal te gangags byin na kha zas med par 'ongs na de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o// dga' sdes bsams pa/ sdug sngal mi bzad pa dog pathob na yang 'di de la gsod par rtsom na/
200a3: gal te de la zas med par 'ongs na lha smos par mom pas yi sa sgri sa bye snyam nas des de la spring ba/ dga' bo na re 'di skad ces gal te gang gas byin kha zas med par 'ongs na de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o zhes zer ro// gang gas byin gyis kha zas btsal ba las cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas
200a4: des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar des bdag zos par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des dga' sde la spring ba/ mi bkren ltogs pa'i shugs kyis yongs su dub nas// nyam thag snying rje mang bar 'gyur bas khyod// byas pa chud gson sems can de la ni/ gang gas byin pa phyir mi 'ong zhes
200a5: gsungs/ / zhes spring ngo // dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gang gas byin gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ne'u le dga' bo gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no// da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi
200a6: gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor pa yin no/ / gang gatshom skyes dgras rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe rgyal pos de la spyos nas gzhon nu ci'i phyir khyod kyis nga la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'bangs/ de smras pa/ chog pa 'tshal ba'i slad du ste/ lha la ni longs spyod mang 'a
200a7: na bdag la ma mchis so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na song la tsam pa bzhi dang bcas pa khyod kyi yin no// de dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas lha sbyin gyi drung du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa thob bo// ngas smras pa/ gzhon
200a8: nu khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu mthong ma/ 'phags pa ma dang yang pha rol gnon pa gyis shig dang / khyod kyi mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// des tsam par dpyad bab pas gtso bor brtsams te gtses pa na skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa la zhugs te/ kha cig na rkyal

200b1: 'a ga su da nga sa can pa rnams kyis rgya tham sa nyas zhugs pa/ lhag na sa ban sa/ a pan thas lags kya/ ldagazhan dum ma thog par ma da pa' gas sa// pos snyam ga/ gnon
200b2: byung dum mal ga pa byed/ des stsas pa/ lha dadu byas par mi byung bags so// rgyam pos smras pa/ gzhon na sa ted lhan rgyam go'i bab 'ab zhig gartogs par lam ga byer gyi/ des yulam ga dngas nas lha ston cidrung du dang ste smras pa'angang /
200b3: pa bdag gis rgyal po'i 'ba'aba' shig ma gtogs pa yul mag d+harnams cad thob bo// des smras pa/ gnon nu pa rol tu nad pa'i 'bras bun de 'dras yang pha rol gnod pa kyis shig/ des yul mag d+hA rlag par bya bar brtsams pa na yul mag rnyan gnas pa'i skye bor
200b4: tshogs kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/ lha gzhon nus yul ma ga d+hA rlag par bgyis yis zlog mdzod cig/ rgyal pos de bkug te spras pa/ gzhon nu ci'i phyir yul ma ga d+hA rlag par bya/ des spras pa/ lha bdag gi skye bo'i tshogs phal mo che rgyas par mi 'grur
